name: Coty Hall
text: This location is fairly new, the major lines have died down. I went around 11:30am and there were only a handful of cars in the drive thru. Order accuracy was mostly good. They didn't give me pickles on the sandwich like I asked but they also forgot the dipping sauce I asked for. Ordered a spicy chicken sandwich and an 8 piece nugget combo. Food was good, only slightly room temp. I will be back ofcourse.

name: Why Certainly
text: I agree with the previous reviewer. They need more quality control. Got home and realized they had not given me the food portion of a whole combo meal. Meanwhile the employees had time to talk amongst themselves and have a good ole’ time while serving customers. You guys have got to do a better job with making sure your customers receive all of the expensive food items they have paid for.

name: Alorah Hammond
text: The food taste good but with as many workers that they have in the building someone should double check bags before they go out. I work nearby and have gotten lunch here twice this week and haven’t received my French fries both times. Their frozen strawberry lemonade is DELICIOUS

name: Adriane Perkins
text: Just left this location and waited in drive thru for almost 30 minutes to get home to an old sandwich, hard bread and fresh fries.. All I can say is wow and this store just opened up just a few weeks ago.

name: lewis holmes
text: This Popeyes have bad service at the drive thru. Also,  workers don’t know how to check the receipt and properly give the customer their food. I didn’t receive my chicken sandwich.

name: Demetrius Mills
text: The new EastChase location is awsome.  Very friendly and great customer service.  I do love me some red beans and rice and a few other things on the menu.  Lol.  Or a lot of things on the menu.

name: John James
text: There food is getting greasier, and you have to ask for condiments now....

name: A.E. H. Washington
text: Very poor service because I have been setting here at the drive through for, forever!!!!

name: Ray Ray
text: Would like to file an official complaint the store closed at 9:30 and on their door it states close at 11:00. They have over 6 cars to.pull in and they just advised them that they were close. I'm going to make sure that i get in touch with a higher up because this comes just open and already their service is disappointing. I will report this to whoever this needs to go to until there is improvement. This was on 9/5.

name: Robett Robinson
text: The food was good, just not hot. The take out had a wait but expected

name: Jeannie Wright
text: No longer T J's. Now it's Kickin Butts BBQ. Good food, friendly staff. Highly recommend if you like a home town place with good food!

name: Pamela Jennings
text: Stopped in here last Saturday and was impressed. This place knows how to treat their customers. Our waitress was very friendly and tentive. We never had to ask for anything she asked us. We had country fried steak and it was great. The batter had a great flavor and the gravy was just like Gramma made. They bake their cakes fresh.  Will definitely be back. Who knew fresh food and great service don't have to break the bank.

name: Ellie D
text: highly recommend the cajun grilled shrimp.   very friendly staff.  it was nice to meet the owner and hear is story.

name: Charlotte McDaniel
text:
The new folks are great...
Better tasting & better service

name: Todd hudgins
text: Okay for a quick bite a little pricey but ok

name: Renee Poole
text: Good food, nice people, laid back.

name: Billy Peek
text: Service was great and the food was good too

name: David Taylor
text: Very good food at good price

name: Regina Vinzant
text: Me and my hundew  had there all u can eat catfish / w fixing buffet home make cook .

name: Kay Bellakay
text: Food is bad place isn't clean.

name: PAULA Mayo
text: Did not go there

name: Richard Bunton
text: Great Place.

name: Melvin Yoder
text: Big burger!

name: Doug Oden
text: Sucked

name: Opal Hall
text:
Very friendly staff. Good food, especially for the location. Pleasant and chill atmosphere, where it doesn’t feel rushed. Good music, lighting and very sweet waitresses. No wait for a table. Late night hours are probably lit 🔥
I brought my 4 year old and everyone was very cool to us, even though it was getting later in the evening.

name: Mira Polion
text: The food was very good and flavorful! I love that they are open so late and they have a drive thru window. I'll definitely be back!

name: Rhonda Hatcher
text: We love this place! The food is amazing and the staff are friendly, pleasant and provide excellent service. Wonderful atmosphere!

name: Janelle Dunn
text: Great food and staff. You won't be disappointed.

name: Thia Chambers
text: The food was well seasoned and tasty. Little pricey for the serving size though. But would definitely return!

name: Dione Hubbard
text: This restaurant is off the chain!  The food was amazing!  The quality customer service was the best I have experienced in Birmingham.  Classy lounge.

name: Tee W
text: Great restaurant,  chill/laid back atmosphere.  The Surf and Turf burger was extremely good!  Mia, our waitresses, provided excellent customer service!  She's the big reason why we'll be coming back.   The owner also came out to greet us.   Definitely recommend!

name: Rasheen Harris
text: I've been coming to this spot for almost 2 weeks and several times even now I've been in here for over 5 hours . Amazing Customer service .. spectacular food you gotta come experience this vibe ...very upscale . I suggest bringing your friends and family here you will be amazed ...11am-2am best vibe in the city

name: Jaquan Readus
text: The staff was very friendly service was great food even better. It's not fast food quick but it's fast for that quality of food. They are new so they are still working out some kinks.

name: E. S.
text: Yesterday, ordered the Fried Grouper(fried to perfection) with Green Beans and their Smack-N-Cheese...🔥🔥🔥... Going back for a Fiesta Bowl....

name: Jacquie Fazekas-Woodcock
text: Amazing food and healthier than most. I love that I can customize my bowl with lots of veggies! Come all Vegans…or folks on a mission to eat healthier. Great dining option or drive-thru.

name: Keyara Collins
text: Never going again food was horrible $20 for a plate of small end ribs with no meat just black inedible black crust around the edges and there was exposed bone on each piece with the ends crusted with what I thought was meat but just burnt inedible crust then on top of that I asked would bbq sauce come with the ribs and I was told yes and once I got my food there was no bbq I spent $34 for food that I could not even eat I do not recommend

name: Michael Gibson
text: Totally not what I expected before I walked through the door. Had the surf and turf burger with the lobster sauce, and cajun ranch fried. It was awesome

name: Kayleigh Hilliard
text: The food was delicious and hot, hostess was very informative about the menu. I love the place. Stop by! They on point! I will return.

name: Madelaine Bowie
text: Love this place! I was first introduced to this restaurant for an event they had, and have been back several times afterwards. I must say they have been consistently 10 out of 10 in customer service, food quality, and overall vibe check.

name: Carrie Minton
text: Everything about this restaurant was great!  Such friendly staff who want you to have a great experience and the food was amazing!!  If you haven’t eaten here you are missing out.

name: Mac Mann
text: The food was amazing and so was the service. A top notch family owned restaurant. I was greeted at the door by TJ and the hospitality didn't end there. My waitress did an amazing job also her name was Darien. I even had the pleasure of meeting the owner Kachief who was not only very knowledgeable about culinary but was also very pleasant to have a conversation with. Very clean environment and the atmosphere was second to none!  I definitely enjoyed myself and look forward to returning to this establishment soon. Thank you to all who I had the privilege of meeting.

name: kethni jyles
text: I love 💝love💝love this place. The food is fresh and the atmosphere is awesome. This is my new party spot.🎉💯

name: Nicholas McCoy
text: This is an amazing place to eat. Great food and excellent customer service. I’ll recommend this place 10/10. I can’t wait to go back.

name: Cottrelle Eatman
text: 2nd time going, love loved both times 1st I had the red snapper fried, green beans and mashed potatoes, it was sooo good. light jazz playing great date place, the 2nd  time I had grouper(love fish) and lamb chops awesome the music was a little loud couldn't hear my conversations across the table,All in all it will be every other weekend dinning. great food.

name: Positive Development
text: Great ambiance, and  fantastic food! Definitely a great vibe. Will definitely plan my next event here!

name: Reginald Davis
text: A new place to eat off of Finley Ave, from a unique menu with a southwestern flavor. I did enjoy the chicken bowl this trip. Check them out.

name: Craig Minton
text: Rasta Pasta, collard greens and smack-N-cheese all delicious. Great service too!

name: Hunter Krug
text: Absolute FIRE! Unique and authentic flavors, plenty of food on the plate, awesome people!! These guys do it right.

name: damon Anderson
text: Amazing place! Food was very great customer service is superbly efficient!

name: Caron Lee
text: Awesome atmosphere, food is dope and the service is soo good. Omg the food, yo be ready to come again, again and again!!!!

name: deedee Dozier
text: 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰 BEST RESTAURANT IN THE CITY! CAN Y'ALL ADD TURKEY TO THE MENU?

name: Jauwanna Moore
text: We visited this restaurant today and the food and customer service was awesome!

name: GiGi Kinn
text: Burger was juicy and good but fries were awful and the soda was out but didn't realize it till I left

name: aprilk Odom (Ms205eyekandi)
text: Seasoned and cooked very well . Pleasant atmosphere

name: April Devaughn
text: Pleasant vibe.  Entree was excellent.

name: Shameeka Smith
text: Perfect. Food is delicious. I'm going to continue to go

name: Ed Fields
text: Good food, good prices, in a great ambiance.

name: katrina Davis
text: Excellent great customer service

name: Mandrell Mitchell
text: Love it I tell everyone about it

name: Tracy Duncan
text: Absolutely delicious food.

name: Curves Again
text: This place was amazing

name: Ebony T
text: OMG!!! me and family went here for dinner last night. Everything was awesome! My son had a burger, my daughter had the loaded potato, my husband had the lamb chop dinner and I had a chicken salad. The portions are very fulfilling. The only thing I didn't like was the soda. It taste very flat. Not sure if they need a better machine but other than that. I definitely will be back SOON

name: Lissa D
text: The food was delicious, seasoned, and full of flavor. Amazing! Can't wait to go back.

name: Kenneth Richardson
text: 5 star venue & cuisine!!

name: Nashalie Mercado
text: Absolutely, delicious! Loved the vibe in this restaurant. It was like a lounge vibe with amazing food. The staff was super polite, helpful with the menu, and welcoming. We ordered and waited for our food. Yoon a bit but after we took a bite we understood why. Everything seemed to be made right there from scratch. The Alfredo sauce, shrimp, and fish tasted flavorful and fresh. If you're ever in the Alabama/Georgia border Bridge area I highly recommend! Also, a huge plus was it was in walking distance of our hotel. Just to mention.

name: Catrese Davis
text: If you have not been to this place you are missing out on some great food and a amazing atmosphere. I personally can’t get enough of the Jazzy P, good drinks and the smooth music. The salmon and spinach is so tender and tasty but the sauce that covers it keeps me wanting more. All of the food is awesome! I love their patio! It’s great as a hang out spot, date night, group gatherings, and get away spot to relax your mind! Try it and you will absolutely go back for more...

name: Karen Bradley
text: Great atmosphere food and drinks were really good. Nice little local restaurant worth the visit if you’re local or passing through.

name: Andy Sherbondy
text: So this place is oozes with coolness. The music, lighting, people, and food, all good. You can not leave hungry. The menu is small,  but can't go wrong with any of the seaffod platters. The sausage was average, However  the egg and neck bone were fantastic extras!

name: Heidi WuzHere
text: I loved my Jazzy Special crab broil with 2 crab leg clusters. Seasoning was really good. It was fast with good service. We'll go back for sure!

name: Dawn L Sageman
text: I have been eating crab since I was a child and this is comparable to catching it fresh from the ocean and eating it on the beach. Hands down the best crab I have had in a long time. After living in Washington State, North Carolina, and Florida.... and eating crab every place that advertised it was their specialty... this is the best!!! Will definitely be making this a go to for bringing family to when they come to visit! Pleasantly amazed! 🙌🏼🦀❤️

name: Kenyatta Reynolds
text: The atmosphere was very welcoming and in this pandemic I felt very safe eating there.  The restaurant is very clean and the food was prepared deliciously.  Although the wait was a little long,  it was worth it.  My family and I greatly enjoyed it‼️

name: Robert Sageman
text:
Let me preface by saying I am from the northwest and grew up on crab. I have spent many years in Florida also and had eaten crab from many restaurants up and down the gulf from Cedar Key down to Naples. Since my wife thinks crab is the best food on the planet I have been to many restaurants that specialize in crab.

This Joe's Crab Pot was the BEST I have ever had.

Period.

Period.

Who would have thought the best crab ever would be in Eufaula Alabama? When it came out in foam containers I was thinking here we go and where is the butter? Crab has to have butter and it wasn't there. So I thought. How foolish I was.  Once I realized the carton was filled up entirely  with butter and the crab had infused with that butter and all those wonderful seasonings they used. They had me.

The staff and atmosphere was great. I think I saw live entertainment for jazz nights. Going to be checking that out if there is. All the rest of the boil was good too.

name: Louann Owens
text: When we first walked in we thought this isn't going to be worth our time of eating, well turns out it was absolutely amazing. We had a party of 11 and no one had the first complaint about any of the food. If your ever in the area this is definately a place to check out. It's not anything quicker say but once you get your food it's worth the wait and the staff was great.

name: Kathy Perez
text: This was an awesome place to eat seafood. Service was a bit slow but all in all the food was to die for. I will definitely be back

name: Amber Hendrix
text: Joe's Crab Pot has been an excellent addition to the community! I love how they are always adding new things to the menu. The food is always fresh and of great quality! They do a great job at pleasing their customers! You leave full and satisfied! Not to mention, the prices are very reasonable and you get so much food for your money!

name: Daphne
text: Such a great experience here. The food, especially the seafood is absolutely delicious. I had the Jazzy Special Crab boil. Very nice atmosphere and exceptional customer service. You will not be disappointed.

name: Terry Mauldin
text: The best crab legs we have ever had!! Everyone so nice and food amazing

name: Gina Curvin
text: Wasn't sure what to expect when we walked in but the food was amazing. Had the seafood in that amazing butter sauce. Prices were reasonable and staff was very friendly. Even provided the kiddies with ice cream for dessert.

name: TM Coleman
text: Joe’s Crab Pot is a must for surrounding areas and folks passing thru. The food and drinks are AMAZING!!! Great professional staff who truly take care of customers. South Beach vibe with nice music. You won’t be disappointed!!

name: jeff stan
text: The staff is friendly and very well mannered.. only reason I didn't rate it more is because the pictures are word a thousand words but the taste of the food wasn't one of those words... I had the Jr which was 23 bucks. 3 plates leads to 76... And there was no flavor whatsoever... Really need to learn to spice it up with flavor as the seafood tasted like it was boiled in plain water and sprinkled with the green stuff... It wasn't tasty at all.... I have eaten many crab boils and this one was the #1 waste of my money and time. I don't recommend it... Note to owner the neck bone was good maybe chicken fish and soul food is your thing but not seafood.

name: Susan Grantham
text: Oh my goodness the food was good here!!! We have always eaten at another restaurant in Eufaula, but this is our new favorite. The restaurant was clean, atmosphere was relaxing and the staff was very congenial. Could not have asked for a better meal.

name: Earl Joyner
text: The food was delicious and the drink was perfection.  The place was fun too.

name: T Coleman
text: OMG!!!! Where do I start!! Joe's Crab Pot is the best seafood spot in the South!! As a seafood lover I've tried hundreds of places over the years but nothing beats this!! Nice vibe, great drinks & awesome staff!! Cant beat that. Will definitely visit again & again!!!

name: Kathy Perez
text: This was an awesome place to eat seafood. Service was a bit slow but all in all the food was to die for. I will definitely be back

name: Dave McNish
text: Only reason there is not a 5th star is because of the establishment and atmosphere itself. The food was amazing, the staff was polite, and building inside needs help. You can see the same in most of the reviews below. DON'T LET IT STOP YOU FROM GOING!!!. Hopefully they will get a chance to remodel and turn it into an even better restaurant. Great food.

name: Tameca Jones
text: Joe's crab pot is one of my favorite seafood places.  The staff is very friendly and courteous.  The food is awesome and I love it here!

name: shayonne peterson
text: You will not be disappointed with Joe’s 🦀 Pot!! It’s a family owned business where the food is fresh and cooked with Love. The atmosphere is always pleasant and the food is ALWAYS ALWAYS on point!!

name: drivasmary
text: Food was excellent!! I really enjoyed it but I hope there will be changes with the interior soon. When you walk in the door it's not what you would expect. You wouldn't know they were in business if you didn't know for sure. They are hard working people but the inside needs work.

name: June Johnson
text: We came down to camp at Lake Eufaula Campground. We were looking for a good place to eat and googled Joe's Crab Pot. It was awesome! Nicely decorated, Great wait staff and Awesome seafood!! Definantly  going back next time in the area!

name: Jeremy Brown
text: Shrimp & grits was amazing!! I asked about the "neck bone" I saw on the menu. They gave us a sample and it was so tender and juicy. Ill definitely be back for that.

name: Gabe Irvin
text: Maaaaan! Yes. Guy sitting next to me said the neck bones were great. I got the big plate that included them. I only have one regret. Shoulda had it for lunch so I could enjoy the leftovers for dinner!

name: Mason Irvin
text: Great food , great service, couldn’t ask for much better, both of the cooks came to make sure everything was good, walked around talking to people to make sure everything was great, which everyone around us said there’s was, would recommend any day of the week to anyone

name: Jeremy Brown
text: Shrimp & grits was amazing!! I asked about the "neck bone" I saw on the menu. They gave us a sample and it was so tender and juicy. Ill definitely be back for that.

name: Tameca Jones
text: Joe's crab pot is one of my favorite seafood places.  The staff is very friendly and courteous.  The food is awesome and I love it here!

name: Gi Gi
text: There food is very tasty, employees are very friendly and you will enjoy food and drinks and also have great time

name: Mason Irvin
text: Great food , great service, couldn’t ask for much better, both of the cooks came to make sure everything was good, walked around talking to people to make sure everything was great, which everyone around us said there’s was, would recommend any day of the week to anyone

name: Pam Bowne
text: Wonderful place. The food was great and the staff are very friendly. I love the soft jazz playing.

name: Shanika Griggs
text: The food is always on point and delicious. Great customer service.

name: June Johnson
text: We came down to camp at Lake Eufaula Campground. We were looking for a good place to eat and googled Joe's Crab Pot. It was awesome! Nicely decorated, Great wait staff and Awesome seafood!! Definantly  going back next time in the area!

name: T Coleman
text: OMG!!!! Where do I start!! Joe's Crab Pot is the best seafood spot in the South!! As a seafood lover I've tried hundreds of places over the years but nothing beats this!! Nice vibe, great drinks & awesome staff!! Cant beat that. Will definitely visit again & again!!!

name: Tammie Beavers
text: Delicious food and great vibes. I highly recommend this spot. And let’s not forget the great entertainment,

name: Cedreika Moore
text: The food and service was great the staff is friendly and welcoming The neckbones was so tender the seasoning it is a must try anytime your in the area stop here and try for yourself the crab pot it’s delicious!

name: Scott. Land
text: Excellent seafood. Large portions and the staff is super friendly!

name: Randy Wilson
text: The food and service we received was excellent !!! Great atmosphere and reasonably priced.

name: Pre K
text: The food was delicious and the customer service was very professional. I highly recommend this restaurant!!

name: Darya Sanders
text: Awesome food great customer service 😍🥰😘

name: Richard Deeds
text: Food excellent long waite. Check out a disater.

name: Ryan Lewis
text: Simply the best crab legs and shrimp I have ever had. Was absolutely amazing.

name: Anthony Roberts
text: Food was great,  but service was a little slow. Clean and nice environment!!

name: Tracy Jackson
text: It's a very nice environment, a friendly staff and the food is amazing. If you're ever in the area please try this place out.

name: Jane Doe
text: This was a EXTREMELY hidden food gem. Don’t let the appearance of this place fool you. It was nothing open Sunday night in Eufala. We came here by default. However, this place has the best seafood boil l ever had. The crab legs were perfect. The flavor of everything was amazing. I will come to eat here every time we come to the hunting camp. Delicious 😋

name: Rene Petrey
text: All I can say is wow and you must stop and eat at Joe's Crab Pot/ Joe's Food Factory when you are in Eufaula.   Excellent seafood and the nicest folks you can meet.

name: Vaskin Truttling
text: Great service friendly atmosphere....very clean

name: Marilyn Woods
text: Everything was wonderful it was my birthday on Friday and my God son and his gf took me out to eat  Harold and his staff did an amazing job made my night special every got a happy birthday song

name: Melissa Daniels
text: The owns are very friendly and the food was wonderful especially for the price!

name: Charlene Johnson
text: Excellent food and good people to eat with..

name: Jennifer Lawrence
text: The food was good and hot. The drinks were great! The service was excellent! YES... I recommend this establishment ti anyone

name: Garcia Wilson
text: Great atmosphere, good food, definitely going back..

name: Eric Tucker
text: Love the place nice people and great food and service was great they made you feel welcome

name: Terrie moseman
text: Best crab boil ever. Great music. Really nice people.

name: Paulette Key
text: Excellent  food and service!  We will be back.

name: DAVID MCQUEEN
text: One of the Best Eating Place in Town!

name: Mike McCormick
text: Excellent food ! Even better Staff. Had a blast. Highly recommend!!!

name: Bryan Ruh
text: Awesome place, Great Food and service. Cory is great!

name: Audi Yo Yo Turn Music
text: The best food in the world. Awesome staff, and awesome atmosphere!!!!!!!

name: Brandon Lewis
text: Good food drinks & karaoke!!

name: Todd Walker
text: Simply AWESOME food! And Corey is the best!

name: Charles Croyle
text: Called in, waited 45 minutes to be told to wait because they sold half my order??? Never return

name: Travis Blue
text: Awesome food

name: Katherine Knighton
text: The food is amazing!! Highly recommend! We will definitely be back regularly!!

name: Mark Mendola
text: We ordered the royal shrimp, fish tacos, shrimp tacos, and fish plate, with key lime pie for dessert.  The staff was up front about the wait time being long, but the food was actually out about 15 minutes earlier than the one hour estimate.  The dockside views were gorgeous and the food was all fantastic, with the royal shrimp and key lime pies particular highlights.

resp.text: Mark, thank you for the great review!  I am so happy that you all enjoyed your meal and the view. Sorry about the wait time and thank you for being patient.  Hope to see you all again soon.

name: Stefan Russell
text:
Location, location, location! And some good food too! Great fish tacos, and good shrimp salad croissant sandwich. Fries are perrrrrfect. Enjoyed two meals here with incredible sunsets each time. The dock patio is open and roomy, perfect for a large or small group. Bar up top is relaxed and casual, and one of the funniest bar signs I've ever seen. Friendly bartender makes it great. I wish food and drinks were served in reusable containers to not have to create so much trash.
Dolphin sightings included!

resp.text:
Stefan thank you very much for the great review!  I am so glad that you enjoyed your food and the atmosphere.  Hope to see you again soon.
Candy

name: Allison Moss
text: This restaurant is great, amazing food and great service! You can eat inside or even outside! Outside there are docks and a view of the ocean. Inside there are tall tables and short. Overall great and you should definitely come if visiting.

resp.text: Allison, thank you for the great review.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your meal and the amazing view.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Lesley Watson
text: We enjoyed the food - plenty of seafood on our plate and cooked to perfection. The view was great and we even saw a rainbow. For the small atmosphere, we were impressed with the food.

resp.text: Lesley thank you so much for the great review!  I am so glad you enjoyed the food and hope to see you again soon.

name: Jason Mckay
text: We stopped in for a casual sunset dinner on a Saturday evening.  Candy at the front desk was very friendly and made us feel so welcome.  We had fried and grilled fish platters, both hit the spot.  If you would like a beer with dinner, grab one from the bar upstairs.  After we watched the sunset from the dock, we enjoyed chatting with the cook who had also come out for his sunset viewing ritual. A true gem on the island, in the making.  Will definitely visit Candy and the crew again next time we come down for the weekend!

resp.text:
Jason, thank you very much for the great review! I am so glad you two enjoyed your dinner and evening with the beautiful sunset.  Have a great weekend and hope to see you two again soon.
Candy
Owner, Dockside Seafood Restaurant

name: millie stars
text: The food here is amazing! The chicken strips were so good! So we’re the fries! But the only reasons it’s 4 stars is because we didn’t get much food in our “plate” so it was not that filling.

resp.text: Millie, thank you for the great review.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your meal. The chicken strips meals have four strips, it looks like that is a kids meal instead of the chicken tender basket.  Please feel free to email me at candy@docksidedi.com and I will be glad to compensate you for the meal.  Thanks again for dining with us, hope to see you again soon.

name: Jennifer Mendola
text: Everyone in our group loved dinner tonight.  Staff were clear up front that the wait for food would be long, but it was worth the wait. Great outdoor patio. We watched the sunset and enjoyed the views.  The steamed shrimp basket was fantastic, and the flavor on the fried fish was great. No wonder it was a bit of a wait (45 minutes) it was amazing!

resp.text: Jennifer, thank you for the great review!  I am so glad that you enjoyed your dinner.  I am sorry about the wait time, thanks for being patient.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Kristin Acord
text: This food was absolutely amazing and such a good price!! The atmosphere and workers were spectacular! It is definitely a must visit if you are in the area!

resp.text: Kristin, thank you for the positive review.  I am so glad that you enjoyed the food and atmosphere.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Kathy Quattrocchi
text:
Gave it 2 stars because at least the sweet tea was good. Alcohol drink tasted like cough syrup and food was at least hot. That's the best part of the review.
Everything taste like fish, which was not crispy at all and pretty tasteless. Fries had set out for awhile and were very bendy. Shrimp was barely cooked and again...I don't think have seasonings on hand. Very bland and definitely do not recommend.
We are going home and making tacos....best of luck if you decide to go ahead and try it.
We should have listened to the other reviews but nothing else was open.
Pretty

resp.text: Kathy, thank you for the review. We do not serve alcohol at this establishment. I am sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience while dining with us. If you could email me at candy@docksidedi.com so we could further resolve the issue at hand.

name: Ladonna Haefner
text: I love the food.  We came here a few times during our week stay.  The fried shrimp tacos are so good.  The staff working was so friendly nice. One night we came it was busy but the staff was still friendly and had smiles while working hard and making great food.  I also recommend the fish poboy.

resp.text: Ladonna, thank you for the great review.  I am so glad that you enjoyed your meal.  I hope to see you again soon.

name: Mo Digma
text: The food was alright but expensive for what you get. Won't be back this trip. It's a fairly new business that probably survives off of tourists trying it.

resp.text: Thank you for the review.

name: Jason Walton
text:
Grabbed lunch here while on a bike ride across the island.  Three of us ordered the fish sandwich and one burger.  All the food was excellent, and brought to the table in reasonable time.  The price was inline with what you'd be expect while at the beach; not cheap, but reasonable for the food quality.
There was construction underway, but noise was kept to a minimum.  Dining area inside was cool and quiet enough to have casual conversation.
We'll be back again next year.

resp.text: Jason, thank you very much for the great review!  I am so glad you all enjoyed the food and great atmosphere.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Elaine Beyer
text: Had a great time at Dockside on our boating day! Beautiful deck, great food, and very friendly staff. I highly recommend the grilled fish!

resp.text: Elaine, thank you for the great review!  I am so glad that you enjoyed your lunch, hope to see you again soon.

name: Toni Marchese
text:
Ordered steamed shrimp, potatoes and corn. Only got one small red potato and was not cooked. I could not cut it or break open with the plastic fork. Which I had to go and request, along with salt and pepper. Small corn cob was not hot either. Had very limited menu.I would not go again.
Ice tea was very good and view
of bay was nice.

resp.text: Toni, thank you for the review.  I am sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience while dining with us.  If you could email me at candy@docksidedi.com so we could further resolve the issue at hand.

name: Kristy Waddell
text: On vacation with my grandson and we wanted seafood from a local restaurant.The staff was super friendly and the food was great! When we come back later this summer this is definitely going to be our dinner spot. The view and the pelicans perched outside made it even better.

resp.text:
Kristy thank you for the great review! I am glad you enjoyed your meal, it was a great pleasure meeting you and your precious Romeo 😍Hope to see you again soon.
Candy

name: Jason Kyle
text: Took awhile to get food but it was rodeo weekend, hamburger was meh, the shrimp was fantastic though. Seems to be more of a hangout for locals, bar looked fun.

resp.text: Jason, thank you for the review.  I am so glad you enjoyed the shrimp and sorry the burger was meh.  We are a restaurant downstairs and the bar is a separate entity upstairs.

name: James Davis
text: If I could have rated this zero stars, then I would have. The people running the place were as rude of any restaurant people I’ve ever been around. Would not take our order for 45 minutes as the “kitchen was backed up!” The place was essentially empty with maybe 2-3 tables. I don’t care how good the food is, I will never spend a $ there! Good luck staying in business.

resp.text: James, thank you for the review.  I am sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience while trying to dine with us.  It is not being rude by informing the customers that there will be a wait, it is actually a courtesy to  communicate with customers and keeping all informed.  If you could email me at candy@docksidedi.com so we could further resolve the issue at hand. Thank you for your well wishes!!

name: Brenda Stewart
text: We ate a few times here while on vacation. Miss Candy is very friendly and nice!! Wait staff is very helpful. Food is great!! Make sure you stop by.

resp.text:
Brenda thank you for the great review! I am so glad you enjoyed your food and the service. Hope to see you again soon.
Candy, owner

name: Nicholas Nelson
text: Very disappointed I haven't been down to eat since last September and saw my favorite little quaint restaurant had been replaced. The menu was very lacking and had so few options on it I almost considered leaving. If you're expecting JT Sunset Grill I recommend going to Islanders not very far. It has a much more extensive menu. For reference the menu only has 4 options for meals plus two starters and a handful of sides. Granted they do have a few daily specials to add on top of that but not anything special.

resp.text: Nicholas, thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience while dining with us. If you could email me at candy@docksidedi.com so we could further resolve the issue at hand.

name: Heather Johnson
text: So glad we came in.  Fish tacos with Cobia were so good.  Royal Red shrimp were a terrific meal. Still some new construction on the deck but inside is clean and inviting.

resp.text: Heather thank you for the great review. We are glad that you all enjoyed, hope to see you all again soon. Safe travels 😉

name: Steven Kitchens
text: Food was pretty good, server was super nice. The wait was pretty long, in the neighborhood of 45 minutes, but we had eight people and they were really busy when we came so that was somewhat expected.

resp.text: Steven thank you for the great review! I am glad you enjoyed your dinner, sorry about the wait. Hope to see you guys again soon.

name: Anastasia Howarth
text: If I could leave 0 stars I would. The older women at the front desk was rude and was talking smack with in ear shot about me having my service dog. She didn’t give any information like the self service drink fridge etc. The coleslaw was  terrible no flavor and the fries were burnt. The shrimp was good but don’t bother getting any sides.

resp.text: Anastasia thank you for the review.  If you would like to discuss the situation any further you can email me (the older lady at the front) candy@docksidedi.com I am the owner. Thanks

name: Tim Rawlings
text: "Tried" to eat there tonight after 10 hours on the road never even got to order the lady taking orders left to go work in the kitchen leaving 12 or so of us to stand there wondering if we were going to get to order (we didn't) after 45 minutes of being ignored we left and went to subway. The staff just didn't seem to know what they were doing!

resp.text: Tim thank you for the review. I am sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience while trying to dine with us. The lady taking orders was me the owner.  The restaurants on the island along with the rest of the country has a shortage of staff.  I let all customers know if there is going to be a wait time and if the kitchen needs help with getting food orders completed I will personally get back there and help to make sure all of the food comes out hot and is satisfactory to our customers.  If you could email me at candy@docksidedi.com so we could further resolve the issue at hand.

name: Heidi Stallman
text: My whole family loved Dockside! The grilled shrimp basket and fish basket were excellent. The service was fast and friendly, and the view and atmosphere on the outside deck next to the water was a lot of fun. I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thank you very much Heidi! We appreciate your business and are happy that you enjoyed the food. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Lori Ann Murphy
text: I had a hankering to try fish tacos and was not disappointed. The fish was blackened and so refreshing. The food was fresh and I had half & half tea which was perfect and delicious. I usually try the slaw at seafood restaurants but usually end up disappointed, but the slaw was really good here. I knew the restaurant has changed hands again because the last time I ate there (it was not Dockside then) I was very disappointed. I had ordered the shrimp po-boy which was what I'd always gotten before it changed hands that time. It had always a basket filled with enough shrimp to make a 2nd po-boy if you wanted to, but that last time there may have been 6 shrimp on my sandwich. I didn't go back until yesterday, which was about 2+ years, and I will go back again and eat. It was delicious. I recommend this place to anyone wanting a great fish taco.

resp.text: Lori thank you very much for the great review! I am glad you enjoyed your dinner. Hope to see you again soon!

name: Timothy Cobb
text: Best fried shrimp poboy ever. I absolutely loved it

resp.text: Timothy, thank you for the great review.  I am so glad you enjoyed the Po' boy.  Hope to see you again soon.

resp.text: Rob, thank you for the review.  Sorry you did not enjoy your Royal Reds and Shrimp salad, both are very popular items on our menu.   If you could email me at candy@docksidedi.com so we could further resolve the issue at hand.

text: Good food for the price. I went for lunch and it was pretty empty for a Saturday afternoon. Food came out in a timely fashion, and was hot and ready for consumption. There needs to be a better selection of seafood, as I found it to be a little lacking. The staff was friendly and willing to help me decide on what I should try. Tables and silverware were clean, and the food area seemed to be set up in a thought out way.

name: Willie Veasey
text: Carrabba's is always good.  However, I didn't eat there this time (though i have before).  My guest and I decided we wanted some place with more vegetables, so we went to another restaurant.  The food at this Carrabba's is very good and they give you enough food to take some home for dinner.  Price is a little pricey, with the average meal being about $15, but like I said, you get enough for dinner.

name: Eric Lewis
text: Its a chain, but they do a good job with generic Italian. Fair wine selection, not extensive, but you can ask the servers if they have anything not on the list. Sit at the pasta bar for  great cooking show during dinner, and some free samples! Employees and servers usually have a great attitude!

name: William Finney Jr
text: Always a great experience, and great food! I ended up going a couple of days before it was shut down. Glad I got to enjoy it one last time.

name: Mike Poe
text: The service started out prompt and the food was great. We then ordered dessert and a glass of Remy Martin 1738. The waitress return with the dessert and check but no drink and left. After asking about the drink she said they didn't have it so I ask for Grand Mariner. 6 minutes later she said it would be just a minute. Then 5 minutes later another waiter ask if everything was ok and then offered to get the drink. A few minutes later he returned with the drink but it had something floating in it so I returned it. By the time the drink was delivered the dessert was long gone which made the drink somewhat pointless.

name: Ivy Harris
text: This place is so great!!! Nice place to go for a first date, outing with friends or family, and even a business luncheon. The staff is friendly, organized, and knowledgeable of the menu. The food is great...it's fresh and prepared as ordered. My fiancé and I go every once in a while and we have never had any complaints. We will continue to visit. I must mention that this place puts Olive Garden to shame and it's so worth the money.

name: Lisa Avalos
text: I  hate seeing bad reviews about my favorite restaurant. I've been there so many times and I've never had a problem. Service is always great and the food is always hot and delicious. The deserts are so good. I'm always picky about deserts. I've tired all the deserts at Carrabba's and I give them all a thumbs up!

name: Dave Holmes
text: The employees we interacted with were awesome Corbin, and Roy were very friendly and helpful. The food was cooked to spec. Definitely worth the money. And on a sunday too.

name: Kaitlyn Carter
text: I read the reviews and was like no let's try something else but I read a comment about experiencing it yourself and I am happy to that I did. IT WAS DELICIOUS!!

name: Mike T torri19
text: Outstanding Service! The waitress and manager were attentive and went above and beyond to make our dining experience enjoyable.

name: Josh Evans
text: Amazing food. Amazing service.  Never been disappointed here.

name: mlybgabies
text: I've tried to place an order over the phone tonight 4 times and have been placed on hold for more than 15 minutes each.  Held on the line just to see how long it would take for them to come back to the phone and nothing.  Called again only to be told could you hold for a moment please--another 15 minute wait. If this is customer service; then I'd hate to see how long it would take to get my food.  I tried online before, only to get there and my order could not be located.  This is the last straw!  Will find another Italian restaurant.

name: Crystal Wickersham
text: I've been going to this carrabbas for at least the last 4 yrs to celebrate my birthday but this year was absolutely the worst experience I've ever had at a restaurant of this scale and price. Service was horrible, took forever to get our drinks once seated after an hour wait, my first glass of wine had lipstick on rim of glass that wasn't mine, appetizers were brought out right before our main dish with salads and bread, steaks prepared wrong, mashed potatoes weren't completely done, no angel hair pasta (my absolute favorite item), and some items were never delivered... And it was not very busy by this time. Seemingly lazy, incompetent and unconcerned staff in regards to customer service and customer satisfaction. Manager was nice enough but somewhat nonchalant about the situation and I'm pretty sure I was not the first to discuss these issues with him last night and I think most of his staff should be dismissed and replaced with people who actually provide the type customer service expected when spending the amount of money we spend here every year. I was embarrassed by the end of the night to have brought my friends and family to this location and have no intentions of returning.

name: Amelia Blackwood
text: Total outrage this place closed, and with no real reason or explanation!  The closest Italian competition (by proximity, mean) was down the street - old & worn, the O.G. (Olive Garden- obviously).  This place paled in comparison to the menu at Carrabba's - free salad & breadsticks be damned...I'm willing to pay more for better quality food & service any day.

name: Juanita Washington
text: After reading the other reviews I had to correct them by saying pleases don't read come and experience this lovely restaurant for yourself. My wait time was short food came out hot waitress was very professional I can't with all of the post I read . If you are reading this judge not unless you walk in there shoes

name: Curt Brewer
text: The Creamy Parmesan dressing is EXCELLENT to dip your bread into. That is a meal in itself.

name: Hamp Dallas
text: Great!!!

name: Antron
text:
After Young Barn Oysters and Pub failed me miserably in the food department and since I was still very much starved, I ventured over to Carrabba's. Surely an Italian restaurant can't mess up Italian dishes. Hence my sarcasm.

I wanted something quick, to-go. The venue was quite busy so I knew it'd be a little while before my order was ready. No problem. But after about 40 minutes I started getting a little antsy. I walked over to the VERY friendly young woman whom I had placed my order with. She advised it'd just be a few more minutes.

She was right, my food (I ordered the Pasta Linguine w/shrimp and scallops, and a Chicken Ceaser salad), was ready in those few minutes she mentioned. My order was totally screwed--the blame could be placed on me for not checking my food before I left, but that's not my job to know their job.

My chicken Ceaser salad didn't have any chicken. They had placed the chicken that was supposed to be on the salad on the linguine. And they also placed some vegetable soup with my order. I don't even like vegetable soup. The pasta was totally dry as well, it was supposed to have a tomato, creamy sauce but maybe mine disappeared, because it certainly wasn't anywhere to be found.

I ended up at least trying to eat some of the pasta but it prematurely & intentionally went into the trash. The salad was fresh though.

With so many restaurant offerings it often hard to give a spot another shot, nothing different in this case.

name: William Streetman
text: So it takes a lot for me to get mad enough to leave a review on a restraunt. But as someone that eats out a lot, my experience earlier tonight was terrible. Our waiter forgot our drink orders, mixed up the sides, and the person that brought our food out Didn't even ask us if we wanted shredded cheese like yall ask every time. Now when I got my food it was overcooked. I'm not sure who the chef is, but please ask them to cook the Chicken Marsala for less time please. Lastly the sweet tea, it tasted like watered down leaves. Please make actual tea. I will be looking back at this review and I'll come back if all of this is fixed.

name: Colby Corley
text: I called to make sure the restaurant was still open at 10:20pm. One person said they closed in 40 minutes while another got on a different line and said they closed at 10 repeatedly and then both hung up. I was only 1 min from the restaurant so I stopped by. They were still open. I order my food and then am told there would be a wait for the food to cook. I'm patient and say that's fine and pull around to curbside pickup as instructed. 30 minutes go by so I call back in because they are closing in 8 minutes. They admitted to "forgetting" they had asked me to pull up... I'm the only vehicle in the parking lot that isn't an employee and have been for 20 min.... how do you not know I've been here for 30 minutes!? I feel that this was done on purpose! They were respectful as they admitted the wrong. This is the only reason I'm not putting 1 star. I didn't receive my food until 10:01... That is 38 minutes after I ordered!

name: Dawn Lee
text: Love that they are so personable. Always amazing service.

name: Jason Cannon
text: Man I love me some Popeyes chicken, but this new store is the worst I've ever seen. They're consistently out of spicy chicken and the regular is trash. I haven't received biscuits on any of my door dash orders. I gave them 5 chances before I wrote a review but I won't be going back.

name: Leviticus Waters
text: OMG THE CHICKEN WAS FRESH TASTY AND THE STAFF WAS GREAT.

name: Chris Moore
text: I cant leave 0 stars so this will have to do. Fries were stale and coated in grease with no flavor,  didn't get spicy chicken as asked, and left out sauce. Probably a personal problem but the food made me sick and the taste of the grease was too strong. The sweet tea was probably the best thing I got from there besides service at the window. Lady who took my order sounded rude and still managed to get my order wrong after I repeated myself several times. Dining anywhere including hell would be better.

name: Marina gardner
text: We always try a place a couple of times just to give a business a chance and this is the third and last time we will go to this location.  Slow and always leaving things out of our order.

name: Nikki Rosario
text: Being this just recently opened up near my house, we were so excited. We have gone here 4 times and each time was not the best experience. First time was on opening day, other than the fact that we waited in line for a very long time which naturally we expected, our order was fine. Second time, I ordered a 4 piece chicken, and ended up with an 8 piece. No utensils, no sauce. Third time,  order was completely screwed up, again, no utensils or napkins. Fourth time, order was messed up again and got a diet coke instead of a regular coke (disgusting). Come on Popeyes, at some point you need to get it together or you're going to lose business. We will still keep going because we love Popeyes, but we are almost at our wits end with this place.

name: Tori Tyson
text: Have gone to this location three times and each time they mess up the order rather it’s not counting 8 pieces of chicken in the 8 piece.... or just ordering a Dr Pepper and getting a sweet tea. Read the tickets, pay attention and do the job correctly 🙄

name: Zack
text: I want my sauce. I paid for it. For real, if you're going to charge for it, put it in the bag. That isn't difficult.

name: Daniel Walton
text: I came thru drive thru,and placed a order   And it wasn't correct but when I came back and came inside the shift manager Epiphany smiled at me and I couldnt even be mad anymore she fixed my whole order over and was sooooo sweet  and nice.

text: Went last weekend it was great. Went this weekend not so good. Chicken was way over cooked . Come on popeyes get it together.

text: Customer service is very good. The food is very good.
