text: Last couple of times I came i was not impressed. This time  I came and stood in line, because of the corona thing I assume, the ticket roller was outside which I and several others passed. The dark skinned woman acts like she has a chip on her shoulder sometimes....I explained that I didnt see the ticket thing because ppl were crowded around the door trying to read the signs but she definitely saw me in line. She wanted me pull a ticket and get behind 7 other ppl🥱.....Naw I'm good I'll take my money elsewhere....I've been a customer for easily 3 years at least but today that attitude finally lost me. Will not be back. She is very temperamental. I easily spend AT LEAST $60. But hey the crawfish is good. She is very good at making sure orders are in and out but if she could be more consistent with her attitude and the manner in which she addresses people she'll be even better at her job which would definitely help this place.

name: G Mills
text: The food tasted good our server was terrible we were half way done with our food when our app came out and the manager I'm guessing brought it to us and refilled our drinks as they were all empty. We waited for the check for a while and finally our server came and offered us drink refills and sauces for the food we were done with. They weren't busy or it might be understandable. The music was too loud for a sit down restaurant and we watched several older white couples come in and leave because of the choice of music. Our 13&14 year olds knew every song I don't mind rap but probably not the best choice. The funny part apparently there's a section for white people there were 3 other tables of white people and some how we all ended up being seated in a square while the rest restaurant there was a table between each group (all black people).

text: Overall the food and service here is good. The steak was cooked to order while the batter on the shrimp was a bit soft and bland. I believe had the cut of the steak been a bit thicker the flavor would have  better and needed less seasoning.

name: Ken Randolph
text: This was one of the best steak dinners that my wife and I have experienced. We've been married 49 yrs. this Sept. 1st. and been everywhere. The server, meal, etc., we're top notch and that's why I didn't hesitate to tip my waiter by 30%+. No more BAD service, and meals, from Longhorn's and Texas Road House. Big, big difference folks!👍👍👍Saltgrass Steakhouse👋👋👋

name: Judy Antonio
text: Our server was great and so was all of our food. Pricey but very good. We were there for lunch on a Tuesday. It was not crowded.

name: Timothy Brown
text: I give it 3 stars because the wait staff are very friendly. As for the food, it seems to be something that you have to have a taste for. I personally didn't like their seasoning combinations but that doesn't make it bad food.

name: Jon Hinds
text: My wife and I enjoyed a delicious ribeye and salmon. Is was perfectly cooked and well-seasoned. We will be back.

name: Anthony Turner
text: Ms. Aurora was the best. On of the most professional waitress I have had in a long time. The food is spectacular. This restaurant is worth every penny and more!!!

name: Shari Harbison
text: The food was awesome and the staff was very friendly. Our waitress was wonderful and checked on us regularly.

name: Joe Tgreat
text:
Six of for dinner on a Friday night as we had a mild 30 minute wait, it was a Friday night so no big deal. The fried mushrooms and jalapeno poppers were perfect.
Our server did a outstanding job of taking care of us and our food was delicious as well. Would I recommend this place?  Absolutely would.

name: Robert Heath
text:
Right off the bat, the place looked amazing. Like a steakhouse should. Rodeo posters from the 80s. Western displays everywhere. Well lit dining areas. All the staff were wearing masks properly.

Our server, Hunter, was amazing! She stopped by our table regularly to make sure we were still having a good time. She kept our drinks full. She even had a bit of small talk with us!

Overall a very good experience that I would gladly repeat!

name: Vanessa Brown
text: The New York Strip was delicious and cooked exactly like I requested. They serve large side portions so make sure to go hungry or prepared to take on leftovers. Our waiter was very nice and great with giving timely refills on drinks. I can't wait to go back!

name: Bridgett Fortenberry
text: I was taken to this place on  my 59 birthday on May 11, 2021 by my cousins. The food & service was absolutely WONDERFUL.  I would recommend this place to everyone.

name: John Wilson
text: My family went on this past Friday night which was busy understood. Our wait was 45 min to an hour. Ended up being longer, because the hostess did a poorly job.  They let a family with the same number come in and go in front of us and when I questioned it the hostess tried to justified  it and said you will be next.  She said oh they are selected members but didn't know their names and gave them our table.  I feel it was something else.

resp.text: Hi John. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Would you please follow the link below to provide us with just a few more pieces of info? We would like to look into these issues further. Thank you. http://www.bit.ly/landrysfeedback

name: Angela Fuller Grace
text: The Texas T-bone was seared and seasoned to perfection..loaded potatoes and broccoli in cheese sauce were the perfect sides. Truly, I enjoyed this meal.

name: Tina Kay
text: I go here specifically for fried mushrooms & fried shrimp.  The service is always wonderful & they don't mind bringing your to go orders outside to you when it's ready.  I never wait a long time.

name: Tiff Tiff
text: The food was delicious and our waitress was great!

name: LM W.
text: We ordered our food to go and it’s our first time eating here since the pandemic.  It was not the best.  The temperature of the food was room temperature including the soup.  The only thing that was absolutely delicious was the pie.  We use to frequent Saltgrass before Covid, I’m highly disappointed in our food this time.  Might not try again until I’m comfortable with actually dinning in.  We did however go back a few days later and order 3 cheesecakes to go.  They’re expensive but delicious.

resp.text: Hi LM W. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Would you please follow the link below to provide us with just a few more pieces of info? We would like to look into these issues further. Thank you. http://www.bit.ly/landrysfeedback

name: Danitra Manigault
text:
My family and I came to Alabama for the weekend and tried this place because it was near the hotel we were staying at. The parking lot was full so we were sure that this place was going to be awesome. Well it wasn't. the food was just terrible. The rib meat did fall come off the bone but it was soooooo dry and unseasoned. My daughter had a cheeseburger that was ok. My mother in law tried the salmon and herb rice. The salmon actually was good, but the rice was mushy. I ate the loaded potato soup. That wasn't bad. I liked the potato soup but that's all I ate. I don't know what batter the used for the shrimp because that was not good.

The server we had was VERY nice and pleasant. She did give suggestions on what to try, but our palates didn't agree.

name: m chadwick
text: Wow great new place for an expansive nice family steakhouse. The prices are a little more. I will say worth it!! Servers are friendly and efficient. The food is great and not skimpy plates. You will leave full and happy..I am sure. We had a great variety at our table. The appetizers were Rattlers. These things are giant jalapeños with shrimp and cheese battered and fried. When you dip in ranch wonderful!!!! The desserts were pecan bread pudding yum!## There was carrot cake such nice size peices. Also cheese cake. Hoover location is close to the Galleria Mall.

name: Kim Akridge
text: Food was great. Worth the 45 minute wait.

text: For the cost, it was underwhelming. My steak was overcooked, shrimp was burnt, they put sweet butter on my baked potato - my salad had old leaves, fried mushrooms were okay, the ranch dressing was the best thing. Wasn't offered a refill and my waitress service was okay.

name: Rod Johnson
text: What a great meal! Order the Maudeen’s Center-Cut Filet medium well with loaded baked potato and asparagus. Steak was seasoned well, asparagus was good too ,so was the mashed potatoes. Order gripe would be the food was not hot. You can tell that food had been sitting before pickup and brought out to me.

name: Francine Jackson
text: The wait time keep changing. When we did get in the food was burnt some. Then the bar close. Not very happy after all the good reports I had heard about this place. I could have went anywhere to eat. But after the good reports I be stayed. Not happy.

text: I went to the location in hoover instead of 280, and I was very disappointed.  I ordered a potato soup and the waitress brought it out and it looked thick like mashed potatoes.  I took a chance and bit into it. It was ice cold. It was so disturbing I called out to any waitress to help!  The waitress who helped me was really nice. I'm so glad because I didn't see my waitress for awhile. That's why I have this two stars otherwise it would have been 1 star. The steak was ok and the macaroni was ok. The chef just slappedsome cold soup in a bowl and have it to me. They should do better.

resp.text: Hi Shannon. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Would you please follow the link below to provide us with just a few more pieces of info? We would like to look into these issues further. Thank you. http://ms.spr.ly/6267Va2bd

text: My company held our Christmas party at this location. The food and service were quite good.

name: Cj Welborn
text: Went there on a whim because we were in the area and it wasn't crowded. We got way more than we paid for. Great atmosphere, great servers, and the food was awesome. We had the steak and shrimp, which was cooked perfectly, and then the pecan bread as a dessert. I didn't even know what it was, but I'm glad we tried it. I will definitely be going back.

name: Donna Chancey
text:
The food is just fanTastic! We had aMazing service, 4 people taking care of 3 of us, and one was the Manager! Recommend:
Rattlesnake Rattlers for appetizer, Carrot Cake for dessert! On-site Baker, Y'all!

name: Donnie Turner
text: What a great Steak House!!! Excellent steak,  the rice was very very good. I love blue cheese dressing but the ranch was better. Medium price range,  won't break the bank on a couple date.

name: Amber Terry
text: Saltgrass never disappoints! ❤

name: Mickey Berry
text: We visited here for our office Christmas party and again last night. Our food was top-notch and the service was professional and prompt.  The steak compares well with higher-priced local chains and at about 1/2 the price. I like the atmosphere and the way the management is involved with your experience.

name: Elizabeth Douglas
text: I went for a business dinner and found the food to be decent, but not what I was expecting from a dedicated steakhouse. My steak and shrimp were flavorful but they and the mashed potatoes were barely warm. The bread was good. The atmosphere was a bit cramped, but we did have a large party. I will say our waiter was excellent and very nice - no complaints about the staff whatsoever. I would give it another try, to see if my experience differed from my initial impression. If so, I would definitely adjust my review accordingly.

name: Nicole Haynes
text: I went in and the girl said 45 minutes and took my phone number an hour later I went in to see when we would be seated only to be told I cancelled. Now let me see how was I suppose to do that. I was informed that I got a text when I gave her my number and I cancelled then. Whelp let me just say I have never gotten a text but I was seated only to have a waitress that was working her third double and didn't know where she was, but I can't say that just about her. We sat and watched staff come from the kitchen wnd try to find the right table food went to. We watched peoples order just get left off and just not right at all. All this for just ok food. Not again

name: Jolene Douglas
text: This is my first ever bad review- Don’t bother making a reservation. The establishment states that they will seat you before walk ins, but in our situation no table was available at the reserved time (we did arrive 5 minutes prior). I called 15 minutes before they closed (45 minutes after our reserved time), and was offered a table by a manager, but was told there would still be a wait by the host. As a former restaurant host, I know the staff dread of taking a last minute before close table- that is the mark of a rude inconsiderate customer.  We may have dodge bad food according to other reviews. I should have waited until they closed to see if they’d bother paging us or letting us know they were closing and could not serve us.

text: On March 16th, 2021 around 2:30ish me and my mom stopped to have lunch here we have ate here previously several times and the food was good . I ordered a baked potato. macaroni and a salad * I don't eat meat* my mom ordered the baby back rib plate . The waitress came out and said they was out of ribs so my mom ordered the chicken without the gravy with a baked potato. Both baked potatoes cold, macaroni cold, chicken tasted burnt and the bread we waited on forever didn't get it until after our meal arrived was cold although she said it was right out of the oven! We ask for the manager he did come to the table to ask could he make it over but we had somewhere else to be so really didn't have time for him to remake what we already waited on, he did take them items off the ticket but made us pay for a salad I didn't eat and a sweet tea I didn't drink . The worst part is they was not even busy!!  Maybe us and 3 more tables Bad service and Food was cold.  Never Again! Very disappointed this time !

res·er·va·tion

name: Valerie Gaines
text: This restaurant is like your upscale steakhouse. The menu is normal, but the prices are outrageous. The atmosphere was good, but the restaurant stays crowded and causes a lot of traffic. The food was okay and no special garnishment or appearance than your regular steak house. Actually Logan's has a b ettet appearance in plating the food. I ordered a mesquite grilled chicken breast, garlic mashed potatoes and a salad. The chicken was a normal size and had the grill marks on the chicken. The garlic potatoes were prepared the regular way. The salad was good, however they add the dressing to it. It would be best to have the customer apply the dressing so they can gauge it to their taste. I attended for a birthday dinner and the waitresses were really good and polite. I enjoyed the fellowship, but the food was nothing special. I think I will stick with Logan's.

name: Kari Osborne
text:
Overall, everyone's food was good, and we certainly appreciated the effort the restaurant put forth to ensure a safe distance between tables. Based on the food, we would go back again.  The reason for the rating is specific to the following:

While the restaurant had a notice posted to the door requiring patrons wear a face mask while inside the building until they reached their table (in compliance with local ordinances), the host really showed no authority in enforcing that policy.  Specifically, a couple sat down in the waiting area and refused to wear the mask they had in their hands or even distance themselves from others not in their party.  Unfortunately, the host did not attempt to reinforce their policy or even get someone that could.

Regardless of any actual benefit of wearing a mask, the lack of discretion in enforcing the ordinances they are bound to uphold in order to reopen is concerning.

name: Haynes Mobile Notary & Wedding Services LLC
text: I took my 6 yr old grand daughter to Saltgrass 12/28/19.  The wait for a table wasn't too long.  The food was average and the service wasn't too bad either.  My server was nice and he tried his best but.... he never brought our salad.  The ribs were not fall off the bone tender.  The chips for my spinach dip were a little too done for my taste.  The server said they would comp those because he said they had not changed the grease the chips were friend in but they never did.  Instead they came back and told me there was nothing wrong with the chips.  They said the chips were dark because the chips were corn chips and not flour chips.  I ordered steak fries and instead I was given diced potatoes and they too were dark as though they were cooked in "Old oil".  The server was supposed to bring us to go cups and never did.  I called back once I got home to speak to the manager (as they were very busy while I was there and I didn't want to cause anyone else to have the issues I had) I spoke to the manager and all she offered me was a free salad the next time I come in.  I asked her if I get a side salad with my meal why would I want 2 salads... She then offered me a free salad if I should be coming through town and wanted to stop in and pick it up.  Chances are great I will not be back to Saltgrass.  I paid over $50 plus a tip for a meal for a 6 year old and myself and I received a comedy of errors and average food and all I was offered was a free side salad with my next meal (that comes with a side salad).

name: D.L Belvin
text: Definitely worth it! Best steaks and Carla was an Awesome server! Homemade carrot cake the size of Montana...yummy!

name: Virginia Gaines
text: The serve was good and food. Will try this place again. And we was 6ft apart and mask was required if you wasn't apart of our group.

name: George Clowdus
text: Good food and friendly service

name: Sondra Brown
text: The food was really good and cooked exactly the way I asked. The waiter was on point! The wait was horrible. The seating wasn't organized.

name: Michael Cox
text: Great food and great service.

name: Bailey Randolph
text: Chicken fried steak was about 2-3 meals worth and amazing. The whole family enjoyed the food and our waitress Ebony (I believe that's her name) was delightful, attentive, and quick. All in all it was a lovely experience and we will be returning!

name: Michael Cox
text: Great food and great service.

name: Dave Barrett
text: Waitress didn't serve us very well.  Slow and had to be asked repeatedly for items we asked for

resp.text: Hi Dave. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Would you please follow the link below to provide us with just a few more pieces of info? We would like to look into these issues further. Thank you. http://www.bit.ly/landrysfeedback

name: Brittani Shelton
text:
My husband and I went for our anniversary on Saturday night. The wait was only about 15 minutes, despite them not accepting reservations. The food was excellent, cooked exactly how we ordered it. The bread was tasty and not burnt tasting like other steak houses.

We ordered the Queso Fresco with braised brisket and it was delicious! I ordered Maudeen's Center Cut Filet with loaded garlic mashed potatoes and it was one of the best steaks I've had. Anouska was a great server. She catered to our needs even to the point of adjusting our plates/appetizers to ensure we had ample room on our table.

I highly recommend it. We have a new favorite restaurant!

name: Chris Smith
text: I loved the service the food was great. My wife and I steak were awesome perfectly cook and seasoned. I ordered med rare and she ordered med well. The bread u get it ok but the butter was delicious. Salads that came with steaks were big size and we love d the croutons that came in them tasted house make. Over was great. My advice be careful with shrimp cocktail made me sick for some reason (I don't have food allergies) I eat shrimp all the Time. But great place to eat tho

name: D.L Belvin
text: Definitely worth it! Best steaks and Carla was an Awesome server! Homemade carrot cake the size of Montana...yummy!

text: Need more than 5 starts. Best steak I have ever had!!!!!

text: The serve was good and food. Will try this place again. And we was 6ft apart and mask was required if you wasn't apart of our group.

text: We love Saltgrass and when we visited Alabama we came to this location. Loved their service and food of course. Try their cheesecake. Great service.

name: Lauren Crandall
text:
This place truely does not live up to the hype. We waited an hour and a half for a table. It was nice that they did texting so we were able to go across to shop and walk around while we waited.
We ordered the loaded fries, which were not fries. They are potato bites, which was fine and they were really good! My companion and I both ordered steak and shrimp items and were both very dissatisfied. The steaks were COVERED in pepper. You couldn't even enjoy the flavor of the steak through the pepper, mine was also over cooked. My shrimp was good though so that was a plus. The Mac and cheese was flavorless though.
The service was sub par. You could tell the servers were swamped and ours literally ran away from our table when she took our drink orders. I don't blame her at all since I know how hard it is to manage a large section. Every interaction with her was super short and cut off by her walking away. When she came to check on our food after we got it she barely stopped. I didn't even bother to tell her we didn't like it because we had already waited over 2 hours for the table then food.
All in all we may go back in a few months, but it wasn't anything special. After seeing all the hype about it I was very let down.

name: Dennis Lathem
text: We visited the Hoover location on a Monday night with a party of 4.  Seating was quick as was the server.  The menu was varied and our party had chicken, salmon, steak and pork chop entrees.  Service was very good and everyone enjoyed their meals.  I am pleased we have another good restaurant choice in our area.  I will defiantly be back for more.

name: david stocks
text: Good food, comfortable spacing, Jonathan was excellent.

name: Chibuike Ulasi
text: One of the best place to get steak.

name: Kumayama Dojo
text: Perfect every time! This is my go to restaurant when I want a perfectly prepared steak. The asparagus is absolutely delightful and is a perfect side dish for a meal.

name: J Haynes
text: One of the best steaks I have eaten.

name: Dena Lowry
text: Great service in s safe and very clean environment. Server was very nice and professional. Food was very good

name: Sha-Ron Hunter
text: Foods not that great for the price. Rather go to Applebee's.

name: Christine
text: Great food! Great drinks! Definitely going back.

name: Daniel Smith
text:
I got the shrimp and some Range Rattlers (shrimp, and cheese stuffed in a jalapeno.)  My wife got the rib eye.

THAT WAS THE BEST MEAL WE'VE EVER HAD!

They were generous with portions, and the service was great!
We coming back soon!

text: Good place to eat at and to go to

name: Jeff Chamberlain
text: Very personable and friendly staff. Food was brought out in a very timely manner, and was all very delicious! Would definitely recommend.

name: Christine Smith
text: Always great food our server Josh was friendly, helpful and entertaining. Awesome date night spot.

name: Dora Williams
text:
My husband took me there for my birthday. It was our first time eating here and it was fabulous! We had range rattlers for an appetizer which are spicy but good. We both had steak his was the New York strip which he said was one of the best steaks he ever had and the wedge salad which he loved. I had the center cut filet which cut like butter.
Most definitely going back again soon!

name: Keith Sharp
text: Excellent  food and great service. Will be going again.

name: Heck Lapahie
text: Good food helpful people

name: Jean Milwood
text: Food was overcooked serving size was small compared to the price

name: Bonnie Morris House
text: I don’t usually give 5 stars, but I don’t think I’ve ever been more impressed with a steakhouse as I was tonight at Saltgrass Steakhouse. From the moment they opened the door for my family it was a 5 star experience. We were seated quickly and the waitress, Kelly, was awesome! She was very knowledgeable of the menu as this was our first time dining there so we asked a few questions before ordering. She timed our food just right so that we were never left waiting on the next course. The food was excellent! In fact, I told my husband that it was quite possibly the best flavored steak I’d ever had. To top off the excellent evening, they held the door open for us on the way out! We will definitely be eating here again!

name: Jackson Hart
text: My family came to this restaurant on father’s day. Because of the pandemic, the had limited seating available for our family of 6. Instead of telling us that at the door, they lied to us about the wait time (they said it was 25-30 minutes), and let us sit there for an hour while multiple parties entered in front of us. Then after one hour they finally let us know that they could seat us at 2 different tables across the restaurant. We finally decided to leave after that. Terrible service. Would only recommend this place to people I want to suffer.

resp.text: Hi Jackson. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Would you please follow the link below to provide us with just a few more pieces of info? We would like to look into these issues further. Thank you. http://www.bit.ly/landrysfeedback

text: Very good steak

text: Great service.  The chicken fried steak was great!

text: Love thus place

name: Louise Czapala
text: Food was just okay & pricey. Orders came out wrong or missing items. Took forever to get the bills right. Waitress was very helpful, attentive & pleasant. The manager did satisfactorily address a couple of issues. We probably won't be heading back there anytime soon.

name: Ina Langley
text: I had the most tender and most delicious salmon and asparagus in this restaurant! My husband had steak which he also loved. The service was great, very polite and attentive server without being superficial or pushy. I would love to go back.

name: Jim Downing
text: Our family of 5 adults went there for dinner.  The decor is very nice.  Everyone had different dishes.  Everyone loved their meal.   The service was excellent.  We are planning to go back soon.

name: Steve Russell
text: This place is terrible.  I went to lunch sat at the bar. There was only one other customer at the bar. Apparently the bar tender has several jobs as she was not behind the bar during most of my lunch. I ordered a cheeseburger and it took forever.

resp.text: Hi Steve. We are always looking for ways to improve and would appreciate any feedback you would be willing to provide at the link below. Thank you. http://www.bit.ly/landrysfeedback

name: beardenjim
text: I was skeptical about this place at first. I figured it would be another lousy chain restaurant with overpriced food and drink. But boy was I wrong! We had the spinach and artichoke dip for an appetizer which was on the happy hour menu, it was great. I had to surf and turf for an entree, the grilled shrimp and the steak were perfect. I never order steak when I go out because they are usually bland. This one had just the right amount of seasoning and char on it. Definitely will be back again 👍

name: Marlon Robinson
text: Perfect choice for me and my wife's 1st date in years

name: Nekayla Anderson
text: This particular restaurant is very slow. They give you a specific wait time, (25mins) which turns out to be an hour wait. Do not come here if you are trying to be in and out. Multiples tables were open, the staff just moved very slow. I will not be returning.

resp.text: Hi Nekayla. We are always looking for ways to improve and would appreciate any feedback you would be willing to provide at the link below. Thank you. http://www.bit.ly/landrysfeedback

name: Michael Mickens
text:
Great service by Carla,

Overpriced Steakhouse- (You can get better food cheaper)

Complimentary Beer Bread- 2 stars

Brisket Burger- 4 stars (However, my daughter ordered it with no tomatoes. She received it with tomatoes and without the lettuce, pickles, and onions that she wanted.

Ribeye 12 oz- 4 stars Nicely seasoned and cooked medium well as ordered.

Loaded Baked Potato- 2 stars- Cold and a tad hard. Not good tasting. Almost a 1 star.

House Salad-2 Stars

Fried Shrimp-4 stars

Brownie Skillet Crumble-3 stars-Cookie too hard

Carrot Cake- 3 stars

Pumpkin Cheesecake - 3 stars (Ordered this to go and they did not include the whip cream and caramel)

text: First class experience.  They nailed a perfect rare porterhouse, and my wife cut her butterflied mid-well filet with her fork. Brandon was an excellent waiter. Can't wait to get some room in the tummy to try the bread pudding. We had a great time.

text: Had a great time with family. This night was great being we beat the rush by calling ahead to get on the list. Service was great even though they were completely packed out! For great steak and fun atmosphere check them out!

name: alyssa holloway
text: My family and I went to Saltgrass yesterday and had an amazing time! All the staff treated us like family and checked on us consistently to make sure everything was good to go at our table. The food is absolutely amazing! I had the bone in ribeye and loaded mashed potatoes! The food and staff makes for a remarkable experience! Great job!!!!

name: Jerry Seals
text: Great feel of a good ole fashion steakhouse

name: Hans Corser
text: Just not a good experience

name: John Anderson
text: Staff was nice and the food was excellent.

name: Valencia Moore
text: I had a get time today.  My sister and myself enjoyed a 12 oz.tee bone steak.  It was cooked just right.  Atmosphere was great.  You can go dressed or casual.  We were casual. Food server was very attentive.

name: Anna Hart
text: I’m not sure how I can give one star to our experience today but the system doesn’t allow for a zero star rating.  It did smell nice in the waiting area but that is as far as we got.  We gave our names to the host requesting a table of 6 and were told that it would be a 25 minute wait at 12:15.  The app said that we were the next table at the 12:45 minute mark.  At 1:05, we were still sitting at the entrance watching the host sending consecutive snapchats from his phone.  My husband complained to an employee who quickly explained to him that seating wasn’t her job.  I think he might have been talking loud enough that someone alerted another employee who came to talk to us but did not introduce herself.  She informed us that she was unable to seat a table of six due to Covid19 restrictions but could seat 5 of us at one table and 2 of us at another across the restaurant from each other. Considering that it was Fathers Day, we didn’t feel that was a feasible option for our family so we left.  We were offered no other option.  She never apologized or Indicated that she felt bad that we had waited almost an hour and could not sit together.   As we walked out, she sarcastically said, “Have a nice dinner”.  We ate fast food for Father’s Day this year at 2:00 pm.  Thank you, saltgrass, for teaching my kids what customer service should never look like.

name: Judy Bearden
text: Enjoyed s great steak, the entire meal was wonderful. The service was also very good. The steak was cooked to perfection. Will go back

resp.text: Hi Marsy. We are always looking for ways to improve and would appreciate any feedback you would be willing to provide at the link below. Thank you. http://www.bit.ly/landrysfeedback

text: Absolutely amazing! blows every other steak I've had recently out of the water. The New York strip with a loaded baked potato and a Caesar salad is pure heaven.

text: We had an awesome  in this place. We enjoyed the awesome atmosphere and the food. The staff members are very attentive. I’m content we ultimately managed to visit this place.

name: Zatie
text: This was my first time going to this restaurant and the food was amazing but our server was horrible. She didn’t even introduce herself to our table, she forgot my friend’s drink multiple times, she never gave us any straws for our drinks, and never took our plates when we were done eating. Her coworkers were wonderful though ,and the food and the work of her colleagues is the reason I gave this restaurant 4 stars. I highly recommend!

name: Melanie Pittman
text: Great food, prepared perfect  and fresh and a great waitress!

name: Blake Bohne
text: Food was absolutely delicious and only reason I gave it 2 stars. Service was horrible. We had to ask for pretty much everything, silverware, salt/pepper. Dinner came so fast I put my salad to the side to eat later. Bar tender took it without even asking if I was done with it. Drink I ordered, she apparently could not make and it tasted like she didn't. Would have been happy to order an easier drink if she would have said something. For a moderately priced restaurant the level of service was unacceptable. I would not go back. But I would be willing to try the one on 280 because the meal was so good. At least what I was allowed to eat.

name: Carolyn Ensley
text: Our first trip there. Definitely a place we will go back to. Server was attentive, was able to answer all of our questions, and friendly. The steaks were very tender and flavorful. Sign of a good steak is not needing steak sauce. We were offered some, but didn't need it.

name: Brian Langlois
text: Try the Mac n Cheese!

name: Nathan Falk
text: Very nice with great service. Steaks were cooked perfectly with great flavor.

name: Vicky Whitaker
text: Only 5 stars because I can't give more!! First bite of my Ribeye and my first thoughts....OH MY GAWD! OUTBACK WHO?? I am from Virginia and LOVE a great steak. Well by God, Saltgrass IS the best steak!! Broccoli was superb! Grille shrimp!! Oh my!! Huge, juicy, as was my ribeye and delicious!! I sure hope people read these reviews!! I'm not in town my longer and I have to try Saltgrass again!!

name: Claudia Elmore
text: My husband and I had heard mixed reviews but decided to try this restaurant for lunch on a Sunday.  They were not busy but it seemed like it took a while to get our food.  My husband’s steak which was ordered medium was well done and dry as a bone.  I ordered the brisket burger which was also very dry, seemed like it might have been cooked earlier and rewarmed.  My side was a baked potato which was not fully cooked, hard and lumpy in spots.  The waitress was nice and attentive but the food was bad and very overpriced.  We love Landry’s but we will not go back to Saltgrass.

name: Duane Constable
text: It was ok.... Not worth the price though. They say the ribs fall off the bone.... They didn't. Just moved to the area. Probably won't go back.

name: Sandi Miller
text: Great food

name: Carlos Hill
text: I visited this restaurant on this past Friday Dec 6 2019.  I was thoroughly impressed with the service, the waiter never let our glasses get empty and the food was absolutely delicious! I would definitely be returning to this restaurant hats off to all of the staff for making this such an enjoyable place to dine.
