text: It was very small asked for a beer they didn't even know if they had it and i was looking at it..smh..

name: Roger Edkin
text: Excellent food

name: casey haynes
text: Maple was great.  It was a good experience!

name: Katy Brown
text: Best oysters in the area. Excellent service, extremely busy. Go for a late lunch or early dinner. Otherwise you wait in the heat!

resp.text: We are so glad you love our service and oysters. Come see us again soon, Katy!

name: Logan Wagner
text: Came here with my family, they told us a 30 minute wait. We ended up waiting over an hour and we ended up just leaving because people were just now getting their food so it would have taken even longer. They tried to put 5 grown adults in a small 4 person booth and when we left It was already 8:20 so other restaurants were closed or getting ready to close, we had to drive around forever to find a place to eat that was open. I would give 0 stars if I could.

resp.text:
Hey Logan,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with us. Unfortunately, we do have a smaller restaurant and our hostess cannot  perfectly predict how long the wait will be. That being said, we hate that you had a bad experience and will learn from your review.

name: angela hardison
text: Fried shrimp and cole slaw were great! Our server took great care of us. We went on a Saturday in September at around 630 pm and sat right down. A bit pricey. There were 3 of us and we got an appetizer, 3 entrees and 2 sodas for $85. Too a star off for price.

resp.text: Hey Angela! Thanks for the review. We will work on our prices to ensure that the next time you stop in, you have a much better experience.

name: Sandy Howell
text: We had Saturday lunch specials at King Neptunes today and were very satisfied. Two different entrees: hamburger steak and shrimp/crawfish etouffee. Both were presented nicely, were hot, and tasty. The etouffee was served with rice (Slightly undercooked ) and was spicy without being overwhelming. Our sides were also flavorful. The bill was $21 and included 1 Coke.

name: Brian Myers
text: Food was great, Royal Reds were delicious!

name: Angie Polk
text: Great little hole in the wall! Had the steamer sampler (crab legs, oysters, peel em and eat shrimp,  and royal reds shrimp)  and it was delicious.  The server was excellent and the atmosphere was really casual.  The only thing i didnt like was they have one restroom Outside but it was very clean.  Ill be back next summer!

resp.text: We are so glad you came in!! Thanks for the great review! We  look forward to  seeing you  next summer!

name: Jeremy Rylee
text: Wasn't that great. Even the gumbo was bad. Use to love this place but its went down hill. Over priced and quality is gone severely down.

name: Andrew Rolfsen
text: 2 adults, 1 teen and 2 kids. 4 meals off the lunch menu and 1 off the kids menu. Time from arrival to arrival of our food was a little over an hour. Food was decent. Service was not. Prices were very high for normal menu items. Seemed like the locals got their food faster. Idk. Wont ever go back to find out

resp.text:
Hey Andrew,
We are so sorry to hear that your service and food was not up to our standards. Unfortunately, we cannot decide when the food comes out or who gets the food first. That being said, we hope to learn from this review and change your mind to give us another shot in the future.

name: kaitlyn k
text: Always good! They fill up fast though, so don't be surprised to wait a few minutes. They cook the food fresh so it sometimes takes a few minutes. Totally worth the wait! Generous portions. Tastes fabulous.

name: Str8shot81 Gaming
text: Got in and sat down pretty quick. Wait staff was kind and helpful. However the food was not as good as we thought it would be. Especially for what we paid for it. The fried cheesecake was really good but that was it. Probably won’t go here again.

name: Dena Barto
text: We ate our way through the coupon booklet. This was by far the best restaurant. Simply delicious.

resp.text: We are so glad to hear that, Dena! Thanks so much for the nice review.

name: rosanne crea
text: Gumbo was excellent.  Bisque was "lick the bowl" fantastic.   Fish tacos were great.  Best hush puppies I've had so far.   Chad was friendly and very helpful.  A bit pricey,  but it's seafood and well worth it.

name: Lori Bittle
text: Awesome best seafood on the gulf coast . Miss seeing Diane and Al Sawyer . They are bar none the best

name: Molly Kennedy
text: Seafood always great.Royal reds and Oysters fresh every Time we go .This is one of my favorite places for fresh seafood

resp.text: Hey Molly! Thanks so much for the great review. We are so happy you love visiting us and getting our fresh and local seafood

name: Christian Thurby
text: I havent ever left a one star review on google before. There were open tables when the 4 of us arrived there, however we still waited 1 hour and 45 minutes for 3 groups to go in front of us. One of them arrived after us. Once seated we didnt get our drinks until 10 minutes had passed. After sitting for another 25 minutes we were finally able to put in our order. One hour and 30 minutes later we left without receiving our main meal. There were four of us total and all of our drinks were empty. The worst service I've ever had. Another table left right before us.

resp.text:
Hey Christian,
We appreciate your honest review. We are so sorry to hear that you were disappointed in your service. Depending on arrival time, group size, and table availability is how we seat our guests. However, we apologize for the long wait time. We guarantee to do better and hope that you give us another chance in the future.

name: Christina Peterson
text: The food was ok. Quite pricey for what it was. The service was not good.

name: Kimberly Brock
text: Wasn't impressed by our server... Amanda.  She's not very nice,  I thought, well maybe she's having a bad day. Another table came in,  she was still not nice.  Until a four top came in and she was really nice to them.  She was also training another girl,  I don't know her name because Amanda didn't tell us.  She was sure to tell the four  top her trainees name and all the specials.  I worked for Al and Diane 12years ago... Very nice people and very good food! Would've gotten 5🌟

name: Francine Howard
text: This is place was freaking awesome. It should be on Diner Drive Ins & Dives. It is a veteran owned restaurant and all the food is made fresh. You can taste the love in every bite. The atmosphere is so wonderful. Wish they would open a few chains.

name: Corey O'Connor
text: Great food, friendly staff, wonderful atmosphere.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Corey!

name: Christine Ewing
text: First, our server, Chad left us unattended and with empty beverages .He brought the wrong food to one guest in our party and did nothing to correct this major mistake. He brought a bloody Mary instead of a margarita to my wife .We were not offered dessert and when we asked we were told the kitchen was closed and it was too late for dessert. We were also told the closing time repeatedly . I feel the entire staff was more interested in "last call" at the local bar then satisfying their guest .

resp.text:
Hey Christine,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. While these examples are not up to our standards, we do hope that you give our restaurant another shot. We guarantee we will not disappoint next time.

name: garrett rea
text: OK, prepare for sincere snark less review: great food, great service, locals aplenty and the best seafood pasta ever. The place is a post-Ivan 2004 remodel where KN must have *tried* to look dumpy. Succeeding there, the menu was huge. Often a liability, but not here. Fried green tomatoes were very good. Fried mushrooms were very good. Fried mega platter has light sweet batter worth repeating. Too much food for one person and sharing. The pasta dish, Zydeco deserves its own food truck show. Excellent! Bisque was meh. Reasonable prices and great to see lots of locals. Plus aged waitstaff is very welcome in this college-drinker-come lately town.

name: Darlene Freeman
text: Food was okay but overpriced for the portions. My husband & I both left there hungry & went somewhere else to get more food. Also, the guy that waited on us had an attitude.

resp.text:
Hey Darlene,
We appreciate the honest review. We will look into our portions / prices to ensure that the next time you stop in, you have a much better experience.

name: ava clark
text: maple was the best waiter! and great food!

name: Eddie Sims
text: Shrimp & Grits! Yum yum!

name: Elizabeth Renninger
text: The food was GREAT.  Don’t be scared off by hole in the wall appearance.  We got the King Seafood Casserole & the popcorn shrimp and both were the best we’ve had.  Service was friendly & quick too.

resp.text: Hey Elizabeth, thanks for the great review! We are so glad to hear that you had a great experience with us. We hope to see you again soon

name: David Qualls
text: Great food

name: Francine Mallisham
text: This place was freaking awesome. It was so worth the wait time. It should be on Dinner, Drive Ins & Dives. Guy needs to go check them out. It is veteran owned. All the staff are super friendly. The portions are huge freshly made and melt in your mouth delicious. I don't even like coleslaw but their freshly made coleslaw tasted like heaven. Just the smell brought back memories of when I was little.

name: Lindsey M
text: Delicious!

name: Sarah A
text: Great food. Family has been coming here for years. Little pricey for dinner but tasted wonderful.

resp.text: We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer, Sarah. Come see us again soon

name: Dan Wilson
text: GREAT staff! Good food,clean place! We hit it about 45 minutes before closing and weren't rushed in the least! lol, of course we hurried though

resp.text:
Hey Dan!
We don't mind what time you make it in, as long as you enjoyed your meal. Thanks for the nice review!

name: Dooky 071
text:
So ive been hearring ure reweivs so i will give yall this and we are planning to come there
The food looks delicious
So we are choosing u for our seafood place in 2020

name: Lori Keels
text: OMG.... The food is so good. This will be a regular place for our family from now on!

resp.text: We are SO happy to hear that, Lori! We can't wait to host you and your family again

name: Robert Rutledge
text: We ate there for the first time last week in thirty years I have been coming to Gulf Shores. Winter prices are fantastic. Food is very good. It does a great business in the summer. Not big. Local flavor.

resp.text: Hi, Robert- Thank you for the great 5 star review. We certainly appreciate all of the kind words and we are happy that you enjoyed your visit with us. We hope to welcome you back the next time you are in town!

name: Sandra Chapman
text: My husband and i went here last year, i got the Jumbo Coconut Shrimp and it was amazing! We will definitely be going back.

resp.text: Yum! Thanks so much for stopping in, Sandra

name: Andrew White
text: The food is decent but overpriced for what it is

resp.text: Hey Andrew. We're sorry that you had a bad experience. We are taking your review and learning from it to guarantee the next time you stop in, you have a much better experience.

name: Janice Johnson
text: Staff friendly and efficient.  Had the shrimp dinner was above average

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your shrimp dinner and experience dining with us, Janice. Come see us again soon

name: Wendy Cotton
text: There gumbo was good. The sea food was great. They staff was friendly

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that you loved your entire experience dining with us, Wendy! Come see us again soon

name: Sara Wylie
text: SO AWESOME!! The shrimp are huge and their po' boy is by far one of my favorites in AL! Super-casual atmosphere, quick service, and friendly servers!! We go anytime we're in town!

resp.text:
Hey Dharma!
Thank you so much for the great review. We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer. Stop in and see us again soon!

name: Jon Moor
text: A little bit on the pricey side with ok food.

name: mandi mercer
text: it was out waitresses 1st day. We didn’t get my husbands appetizer until the food came and only got half of it. His steak had the wrong sides with it. She should of has some help or more training. She told us we ordered it differently . Food was overpriced and cold

resp.text:
Hey Mandi,
We appreciate the honest review. We will learn from this review and will make sure each of our servers are ready to serve before giving them their own table. We are sorry you had a bad experience.

name: Houston Barnhill
text: I guess the restaurant is under new ownership. All of the specials have been pulled from the menu. What's left isn't worth the price. Disappointed,  this used to be a great place.

resp.text:
Hi Houston,
We are very sorry to hear about this misunderstanding.  Yes it is true that the restaurant is now under new ownership  but we still have the same staff and same great recipes as always. All of the specials that we normally run are very much still available! We still have the lunch menu,  all you can eats, all day happy hour  and the basket specials!
Our regular menu has all the same favorites as well! We have even added a few new items to the menu!
We really hope you will be back in to see us soon.

name: Miranda McGregor
text: Great food, good service, friendly staff. Never disappointed when I stop in here for a bite.

resp.text: Thank you so much for such a nice review, Miranda! We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer.

name: alan jacobs
text: Very good food and the server was very good, I had the flounder and wife had the Kings Casserole  and both were very good.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience dining with us, Alan! Hope to see you in again soon

name: Ginny Greene
text: The food and the prices are great. I highly recommend the fish sandwich and fries for lunch. The wait staff is a little less than desired but the delicious food makes up for that

resp.text:
Hey Ginny!
Thanks for the great review. Hope to see you soon

name: I don’t think so
text: Small and hidden place. Great food. Prices are great. Friendly southern hospitality. I loved the gumbo and oysters of the half shell. Place is small and hard to see, but food tasted great. I would recommend eating here.

name: Paul Wimmer
text: Great food

name: Sarah Annunziata
text: Been coming here for over 10 years. Local place. Hole in the wall. Isn't fast but is amazing. They have the best seafood in gulf shores. Fried shrimp and clam strips are favorites and hubby loved the fish tacos although the weird rice with salsa stuff off left something to be desired for sure.

name: Robert V H
text:
Waitress rude and very small portions. When we last visited 2 years ago it was so much better.
We will not be coming back. Drag

resp.text:
Hey Robert,
Please don't write us off for one bad night. We will look into the portion sizes for you to ensure a better experience next time you stop in.

name: Chad kiper
text: Very good food.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Chad! Hope to see you in again soon

name: Lu Willis
text: The crab and corn bisque and the seafood casserole were excellent.

resp.text: We are so glad you loved your meal, Lu! Hope to see you in again soon

name: Andy Roberts
text: The food was very good. The portions are a nice size, the prices are a little high but worth it. We were served by the owner who was very kind and helpful.

resp.text:
Hey Andy,
Thanks for the review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your food and service.

name: Mike Harrison
text: It's are first stop when heading to  the beach  Corn and crab bisque fried shrimp and for dessert  fried cheese cake

resp.text:
Hey Mike!
Thanks so much for making us your first stop when you're heading down to the beach. We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer. And we are so glad to hear you love our bisque, shrimp and fried cheesecake! Stop in again soon

name: Sandra Autry
text: Not much to say. Hamburger  was large with everything on it. Saw a family of 5 come in , their for ten minutes or more an left. No one acted like they saw them come in or leave. Sad business to me.

resp.text: We appreciate your honest review, Sandra. We will learn from it to ensure this doesn't happen again in the future.

name: Al G
text: Great place for lunch! Specials include tea and small dessert. Good to find a place that still serves chicken livers ☺

resp.text:
Hey Al!
We are so glad you love our chicken livers as much as we do. Stop in for lunch again soon

name: Erin Ransom
text: Maple was great!! Loved the food and drinks!

name: Payton Rogers
text: Great food, great prices, and great staff. They certainly don't skimp on anything and it's not well known so it's never crammed with tourists.

resp.text:
Hey Payton!
Thanks so much for the great review. We are so happy you love our food, staff and prices! Stop in again soon.

name: Shakerrial Mcgaster
text: Me and my friend ate here last night and it was awesome.  The seafood was fresh and delicious. The Crabclaws were the best I ever ate.  The shrimp was amazing.  My server was very friendly and helpful when I had questions about the menu. And management was very helpful to when I was looking for a t-shirt to purchase I will be returning to have my ch today.

name: rich
text: Great food, great service, a little expensive, but well worth the cost. Get the coupon in the booklets at your resort or at Rouses market. I highly recommend it!

resp.text: We really appreciate the nice review, Richard! Hope to see you in again soon.

name: Bo Weeks
text: Fish had no taste

name: Steven Jeter
text: Food was OK but it took forever to get our food. The place wasn't even that busy. Just took forever.

name: wendy halsey
text: Yummmmm nice raw oysters, yummy calamari, shrimp skewer salad and crab quesadilla all great.  Brittany aka "Grace" provided excellent service.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your seafood meals as well as our service. Come see us again soon, Wendy

name: Rob Byers
text: Waitress is slow as hell and you gotta ask 3 to 4 times before you can get a glass of water... Poor service

name: Rhonda McClintic
text: I ordered the Reuben special this evening and showed the waitress that it was "completely burnt" on one side.  The waitress said she would bring back another slice of toasted bread and Thousand Island since it was spread on the burnt side.  The waitress also commented she had never seen it that bad.  I can't believe the waitress didn't take the whole sandwich back.  Also, the cheese was not melted--which I also mentioned to her later.  I also gave the waitress the "completely burnt" slice in case she wanted to show the cook.  The waitress was very nice and apologetic.  I would hope this is not the normal procedure at the restaurant.  Disappointed--I didn't expect any issues based on the rating (and it was around 3:00 p.m. and it was not busy)!

resp.text: The ruben is  new to our menu and we are working hard to perfect it.  Thank you for bringing it to our servers attention.  We are sorry for this and hope to see you again.

name: Raye Scott
text: Food was just ok and prices were very high.  Used to love their coconut shrimp, but the coconut shrimp dinner is now $32 and includes only 7 or 8 shrimp... Not worth it.

resp.text:
Hey Raye!
We do have a coconut shrimp appetizer for a bit cheaper to try. We are sorry to hear that this experience wasn't up to our standards, however, we value your loyalty and hope you give us another try in the future.

name: michael morgan
text: Would give 0 stars but can't sadly. Overpriced cramped little restaurant that was messy and the very below average food made us sick never again. Don't waste yalls money or time.

resp.text:
Hey Michael,
We are horrified and a little confused by this review. Our staff and restaurant is very clean, we have even received great reviews from the health inspector on it. We are not sure what made you sick, but we will investigate it to ensure that no one experiences what you experienced in the future.

name: Aaron Weddle
text: My family had a great experience at this place, we was skeptical because of the ratings, however we enjoyed the food and the atmosphere. Great place i recommend you try.

resp.text: We are so glad to hear that, Aaron. Can't always believe what you read, but we are so happy to hear that you didn't and left a great review instead. We really appreciate it! Come see us again soon.

name: Shay Bell
text: It was pretty good and plus the portion size is enough to share, so you will get your money's worth.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review, Shay! We are so glad you love the portion size and the price. Stop in and see us again soon

name: BestTimesNow
text: Not fancy, but great food at a reasonable price.  We like to eat here when we're at the beach.

resp.text:
Hey BestTimesNow!
Thanks for the great review. We are so lucky to call y'all loyal customers and so happy to hear that you you enjoy our food and prices

name: Cade Scallions
text: Poor service. 1 1/2 hour wait with plenty of tables open as we’re waiting. Minimal food for the price.

name: Brianna Wilkinson
text: Fast and friendly to all 20 in our party. All of our food was amazing!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review, Brianna! We are so happy you and your party enjoyed

name: morgan renninger
text: We went closer to closing and after a day being pummelled at the beach, it was worth it!!! The service was great and the food was even better. Get the popcorn shrimp; that stuff is tasty!

resp.text: Hey Morgan! We are so happy to hear that you had a great experience with us and enjoyed your popcorn shrimp. Come see us again soon

name: Kenneth Sienko
text:
First time visit for lunch...food was good, staff very friendly, service not speedy but food is cooked to order so not pre-made.
I would have rated 3.5 stars but app doesn't allow. The regular lunch and dinner menu looks good but have not tried yet. Will go back and check them out. We had the lunch special of one meat and four sides...great deal with free tea. For the resort area this is a good deal.

name: Jessica Hardaway
text: This was truly an amazing place to eat at. My husband and I ate two days in a row. Great service and nice environment.

resp.text:
Hey Jessica!
Thank you for the awesome review!  We hope to see you back soon.

name: Tim
text: This place has great lunch deals and the food is delicious, cooked when ordered so it doesn't sit out like other places.  Prices are great.  Menu is great! Highly recommend bc the seafood is local.

resp.text:
Hey Tim!
Thanks so much for the great review. We're so happy to call you a loyal customer and ecstatic you enjoyed your meal! Hope to see you again soon.

name: Jeffrey Parobechek
text: Great food and amazingly friendly service. Loved it...

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review, Jeffrey! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us.

name: DJ Queazy
text: Whenever we visit Gulf Shores, we always stop here for a meal. The menu is huge, and the food is exceptional at these prices. Local fresh seafood and great drink specials abound. Get there early on the weekends for dinner. Good for kids.

resp.text:
Hey DJ,
We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer. Thanks for the great review!

name: Steve Hann
text: Local type restaurant. Best Tuna Nachos we have ever had. Crab Corn Chowder also the Best; however, main meals fell down because of too much butter and sauce. Would go again. Almost a Four Star. Try it.

resp.text: Hey Steve! We are so happy to hear that you loved our tuna nachos. We will work on the amount of butter and sauce so hopefully we get 5 stars next time.

name: Tracy Gaylor
text: We've come here for years while on vacation. Last night the service was awful. My husband's bisque was not hot. My order was wrong. Never caught the girls name. The grouper was amazing!! I guess wrapping silverware is more important. But we will still be back one bad experience can't undo years of excellence💖💖💖

resp.text:
Hey Tracy,
We appreciate your loyalty and we apologize that you did not have as great of service as you deserve. We promise to do better the next time you stop in.

name: Hazel Barber
text: Great food. Lunch specials are very good.

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your lunch specials! Thanks for coming in, Hazel

name: Ann Welborn
text: My husband and I shared a combo platter that included seared tuna.  Very good.  Also broiled shrimp was outstanding.  I got a cup of corn & crab bisque and it was excellent.  Husband had the gumbo and he loved it.  We ate good seafood everyday of our trip to the gulf coast and we enjoyed the food here the most.

resp.text: Thank you Ann, we are delighted that you enjoyed your dinner with us.  We look forward to seeing you again real soon!

name: Arica Davis
text: We were surprised by the prices. What we got was not worth the price we paid. We ended up going with the 18 fried shrimp special for $18 a piece. It was ok but not worth the price. It's a little whole in the wall type place that one would generall expect to be inexpensive.

resp.text:
Hey Arica,
We appreciate your honest review. We will send this review to proper management to hopefully review the prices for the next time you stop in.

name: Kimberly Keith
text: The food is ok but not worth the prices and our waitress was clearly high on the go go juice which made for an awkward experience

resp.text:
Hey Kimberly,
With it being extremely busy in the summertime our servers have to have high energy to keep up with the demand. We will look into the prices, however, we hope you give our restaurant another chance in the future.

name: Shirley Henson
text: Basket of shrimp & catfish with fries were warm, not hot after waiting 40 minutes. Shrimp were small. Fries were cool, hushpuppies was cold & terrible. The catfish was the only item that was ok. Small portion for small basket with 6 small shrimp, 1 catfish fillet & 2 hush puppies with small bowl of slaw. They are overrated.

resp.text:
Hey Shirley,
We are so sorry that you did not have the best experience possible dining with us. We pride ourselves on local seafood so unfortunately we cannot control how large the local shrimp are. However, we will learn from your review to improve everyone else experiences and hopefully yours again in the future.

name: Kelli Rowe
text: Delicious fresh Gulf seafood always!  Family atmosphere,  great southern hospitality.  Great lunch and dinner menu.

resp.text:
Hey Kelli,
Thanks for the fabulous review. We are so glad you love our lunch and dinner menu as well as our always fresh Gulf seafood and service. Come see us again soon

name: JulzDave Shute
text: One of the best "local dives" in Gulf Shores, Alabama. King Neptune's has the feel of an old fishing boat on the inside. They have awesome "Meat & Three" options as well as genuine and generous cocktails. Lunch is my favorite time to go.

resp.text:
Hey JulzDave,
Thank you so much for the great review! We are so lucky to call you a local and loyal customer. Stop in and see us again soon.

name: Sam Hutchison
text: We decided to stop here since most places close around 9 pm. The server was nice and gave us nice service. The food was sub par and so expensive. The Outside of the restaurant smelled like horrible rotten seafood. We visit gulf shores at least 3-4 times a year and always try to spend our money at the local places. The fact that they charge more than most restaurants that are located ON the beach is insane. Save your money. We found a wonderful little place called The Diner. Google it.

name: Jodi Curry
text: I like to go for lunch and have real food.  The seafood is also outstanding.

resp.text: Jodi, thank you so much for the 5 star review!

name: Dale Rickman
text: Very pricey but good food.

resp.text: Thanks for the honest review, Dale! Hope to see you in again soon

name: Wayne Anders
text: Always good food and friendly people.

resp.text: We appreciate it, and you, Wayne!

name: Angie Minchew
text: Shrimp poboy overflowed with shrimp

name: james case
text: Amazing food . Love the place and people

resp.text: Thank you so much for the nice comment, James!

name: Venus Stork
text: Just got back to our condo and had to write a review on our experience at King Neptune's. Our waitress, Karen, was one of the best waitress we have ever had. She was very knowledgeable and friendly. The food was out of this world. We got the fried pickles and mushrooms for an appetizer. They were delicious. There were 4 people in our party and we ordered the 2 fried seafood platters, a shrimp po-boy and a shrimp and chicken basket(All of which were amazing). We topped it off with the fried cheesecake. It was possibly the best dessert I have ever eaten. It felt like angels were dancing on my tongue. All of this for less than $100. We will be back!!!!

name: Jennifer Markin
text: Fresh seafood and the staff was wonderful!

name: T Marvin
text: The Gumbo here is the best in Gulf Shores! The rest of the menu is ok, a little over-priced, but it is a seafood place, so it makes sense since seafood prices are based on the market.

resp.text:
Hey Trina!
Thanks for your honest review. We appreciate you understanding our prices based on the seafood market since we only sell and pride ourselves on local seafood. We are so glad that you love our gumbo! Come see us again soon.

name: Jake Goode
text: We ate here a few days ago while in town on vacation.  The restaurant didn't have a long wait time (we got there earlier in the night), but it was small, loud, crowded, with other people's table right on top of ours.  The food came out cold. I'm not upset when fries come out cold, but when my fried fish comes out cold, that's just bad service.  We will not be eating here again.

resp.text:
Hey Jake,
We are so sorry to hear that your food and service was not excellent. We pride ourself on both, our service and local seafood, therefore we hate that you had the experience that you did. We will learn from this review to hope that you give us another try in the future.

name: Sue Rich
text: Very slow service and fish almondine had very little almonds and tasted like a frozen fish stick

resp.text: We appreciate your honesty, Sue. We will look into this and improve for the next time you stop in for lunch.

name: Rachel Graham
text: The Crab and Corn Bisque is a must try.  If you want to save a little money stop in for the Monday-Friday lunch special.  This place is not cheap but you get very large portions.  My new lunch favorite is the Crab Cake Sandwich.  The restaurant is pretty small on the inside so your meals come pretty quickly.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the fantastic review, Rachel! We appreciate the great feedback.

name: Ben Murphy
text: Great food, large portions and friendly staff!!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Ben! We appreciate it

name: Vickie Barnett
text: So good and can't wait to go back.

name: Melanie Nelson
text: Food was ok, service was terrible.  Most unfriendly staff I've ever encountered.   We will never be back.    Even when I tried to talk to one guy working there, he just stared at me like I was crazy.  Awful!

resp.text:
Hey Melanie,
We are very shocked by this review because one of the things  we are known for is our great service. We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We will look into this to ensure that no one else has this experience. We hope you give us another try in the future

name: Leah Herston
text: Some of the best shrimp that was served to me on my vacation!!!! Easy going place with pleasant and inviting staff. Peel and eat shrimp, fried shrimp, fried flounder - all was the bomb!!!! Will DEF go back when in the area. Even my kids meals were delicious!!!!

name: Chas E.
text: The service from the waitress was good and very friendly.  The food is overpriced and not that great for what you get. There are a lot of other places better than this for the money. This is not my first time here, but I believe it to be my last.

resp.text:
Hey Chas!
Thank you for your honest review. We will use this to improve for you and others in the future

name: Primetimesha
text: Slow service! I had bacon wrapped stuffed shrimp which was ok. Luv da hush puppies. Fries was hard an slightly burnt! Pricey!

resp.text: Thanks for the honest review, Sha! We will learn from this to create a better experience for you in the future.

name: Tracy Celeslie
text: Always make Neptunes a stop when in Gulf Shores. Love the new menue

name: Warren Cantrell
text: Super friendly staff and delicious food.  We ate lunch here 3 days in a row on our last trip to Gulf Shores.

resp.text:
Hey Warren!
We are so glad you loved our staff and food so much that you came back for 3rds! Hope to see you for a 4th!

name: Tammy Duff
text: Excellent food. The King Seafood Casserole on point! Thanks for the tip Donnie @beachbuggycabservice!

resp.text: We're so glad you love our King Seafood Casserole, Tammy! Hope to see you again soon

name: Cindy Watkins
text: My favorite place to eat in Gulf Shores,  hands down! Everything is yum but don't forget to save room for the fried cheesecake!! It's out of this world!

resp.text: We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer, Cindy. We are also so glad you love our fried cheesecake! See you in again soon

name: Paul Smith
text: Wonderful place to eat!  The food was great and the service was amazing!

resp.text:
Hey Paul!
It makes us so happy to hear that you love our food and service. Come see us again soon

name: victor davis
text: This small place has a long tradition of yummy!

name: Michael Law
text: Food was great. Would have been 5 stars but prices high.

resp.text: Thanks for the honest review, Michael! We are looking into it.

name: Connie Taylor
text: We used to drive down from Montgomery just for the 5 fried green tomato slices with 6 fried large shrimp on top.  They were excellent but the last few times we were there- not so good. I know people who live in Spanish Fort and this is not even on their list of restaurants.   PS After reading other reviews I noticed the only response from the owner was to the five star reviews.  May that is what's wrong.  He needs to check out the 1-3 star reviews and work on the problems.

resp.text: Hi! We try to get back to all the reviews,  we just got our sites working correctly,  we appreciate  your feedback and thank you for being a loyal part of king Neptune's!

name: Andrea Garner
text: Always love King Neptune's! Their daily specials can't be beat. I enjoyed the clam strips basket for $10, and it was a very generous helping.

resp.text:
Hey Andrea,
We are so happy to hear that you love our restaurant and your clam strip baskets! Come see us again soon.

name: Vickie Rhodes
text: Very good service and the food was plentiful and very good! We will be back whenever we get back!

resp.text: Thanks so much, Vickie! We can't wait to see you in again

name: Atthelake Elissa
text: Excellent staff!!

name: Mr. Mark Francis
text: Local favorite and mine too.

name: Brandy Roberts
text: All other restaurants in the area had an hour+ wait time this summer Saturday night at 8 for 6. This was the 8th place I called while looking for something quickly. No where was taking call ahead either. The hostess quoted 30 minutes, but called us in after 15. The menu was a pleaser with a table wanting a variety of pasta, salad, burger and oysters Rockefeller. 2 appetizers, soft drinks and one wine ran $30 a head after tax. There were several vegetarian options, not relatively basic. Everything was right, good and at a reasonable wait for a packed restaurant. I wouldn't exactly call this a dive, but it was quite casual and exactly what we were looking for and in a pinch. Our waitress was pleasant and kept up with us and her other tables.

resp.text: Hey Brandy! We are so glad to hear that you had a good experience! We hope to see you again soon

name: Angela Blackmon
text: Really good food! Love their cornbread and tacos

resp.text: We are so glad to hear that! Come see us for lunch again soon

name: Zach Rutledge
text: Not sure why this is such a popular place in the summer.  The food's just average.  Come during the off season and you can enjoy a very reasonably priced lunch, but you'll get what ya pay for here, with smaller portions (perfect for lunch) and zero flavor. Parking can be a madhouse when it's busy, but there's more around back.  If you're here in-season, be prepared for a big wait.

resp.text: Zach we want to thank you for taking the time to give us your review.  We always welcome all feedback both good and bad.  We hope to see you back again to see why we think our seafood is some of the best around.

name: Cindy Strawser
text: The food and service was fantastic

name: Linda Griffith
text: Excellent fish and seafood! The best!

name: Liz Wilcox
text: The food is to high and not enough of a portion . Service was good have to give them that ...

resp.text:
Hey Liz!
Thank you for the honest review. We will look into our portion sizes and hope that you give us another try in the future.

name: Nick Bailey
text: The owner Dwight is my cousin. Great food, we go to the Bahamas to spearfish and the food tastes just like in the Bahamas! Not to mention the wait for food is only 10 minutes! Would definitely recommend!!

resp.text: Hey Nick, Thanks for the great review!

name: TheKrissy825
text: Terrible service and our food came out cold. $65 for 3 crab legs. Fish was brown inside and greasy. Would not come back.

resp.text: TheKrissy 825, we are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience dining with us. We pride ourselves on our food and service so we are very saddened from this review and will learn from it to ensure that you and others don't have this experience in the future

name: Lafe Highfill
text: Went to lunch, and arrived at 1355 hours.  We ordered the Meatloaf Lunch Special and the Chicken Tenders, Biscuit and Gravy Lunch Special.  The meatloaf and turnip greens were good.  The broccoli was cold.  The chicken tender (singular, not plural for a reason) and potatoes were good.  We had to ask for the cole slaw that was suppose come with it but it was good as well.  The biscuits were ridiculously hard and dry where even butter didnt help, I ended up eating crackers instead.  The bill was delivered so we asked about the dessert that was supposed to come with the lunch specials and we were informed they were out....would have been nice for our waitress who didnt even wipe off our table to inform us prior to ordering....  This Restaurant was recommended to us and doubt we will return.

resp.text:
Hey Late,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience dining with us. This is 100% out of ordinary for our restaurant, especially during lunch time. We hope that you give us another change and again, we are so sorry.

name: Judy Stoll
text: Food was plain, all tasted the same.

name: Shawn Smith
text: Good tasting food but prices were high and place was very small

resp.text: We are a very quaint and small restaurant, but we are so glad you liked your food. We hope to see you in again, Shawn.

name: Sloth Prince
text: Great food, kind staff, and not too long a wait for what you get😊

resp.text:
Hey Slothicorn!
Thanks so much for the nice review. We are so glad you loved your food and service

name: Amunago 0
text: Good seafood, but pricey.

resp.text:
Amunago,
Thanks for the review! We're happy to hear you loved our seafood and we are looking into the prices for you. Come see us again soon

name: Rubee Stew
text: Don't let the quaint exterior and its small size fool you, this place is amazing! Well worth the wait for seating on a busy Saturday night. I had the Steamed Sampler and the Shrimp Boat (Bloody) Mary. Spouse had the 8 oz Rib Eye poboy and our friend had the Zydeco Penne. Everything was delicious and cooked perfectly. Service was exceptional and fast. Will definitely make a point to visit this place again when we come back to Gulf Shores.

resp.text:
Hey E.D.!
Thanks for the nice review. We are so happy to hear that you had a fabulous experience. We loo forward to seeing you again

name: Roshi “ㅣㅐㅍㄷ”
text: The food was very good and had lots of flavor! I was actually impressed. My favorite was the fried calamari with the sweet and spicy sauce!

resp.text:
Hey Roshi,
Thanks for the great review! We are so pleased to hear that you had a great experience and enjoyed your calamari! Hope to see you again soon

name: Diane Jones
text: We love eating at King Neptune's. We eat here every time we come to Gulf Shores.

resp.text: We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer, Diane. See you soon

name: Lisa Allred
text: BEST food ever! Happy hour has great specials! Staff is very friendly and knowledgeable about their menu. My favorite place to eat!

name: Jeannie Handy
text:
Went for the lunch specials. My husband and daughter ordered a $15 plate of fish and shrimp. There were two very, very small pieces of fish and 5 tiny shrimp. Dessert came with my father n laws meal which consisted of 3 small wedges of peaches. Very dissatisfied with serving sizes. Hush puppies were way over priced at $1 a hush puppy....so we were charged $6 for very small hush puppies.

Go to The Diner instead. Don't waste your money and time here. Families work hard for their money and deserve better than the food at King Neptune.

name: Allen Lee
text: Was the best food we had out of everywhere we have eaten at this week. A little pricey but it was worth it! The wait was about 45 minutes but again it was worth it. We had a great experience here.

resp.text:
Hey Allen!
Thanks for the great review. We appreciate you waiting and we are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your entire experience. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Brian Strom
text: Great food and fast service

name: Angela Logan
text: First time and not a great experience considering we waited over a hour to get fried shrimp n fish the server Amanda was very rudish with the hate having to work attitude she never  asked how the food was or even apologized that it took so long its not like they were even that busy she didn't ask if we needed anything dropped the check and came back to get it and was walking off and we had to say hey btw can we get a box and tartar sauce and a drink to go not to mention i ordererd for my sides coleslaw that she dropped off 10 mins b4 my food and I ordered corn and instead got oakra i then realized wasnt worth it to  even wait to get her attention to fix it. The food was very good with better service and time management it would be a great place.

resp.text:
Hey Angela,
We appreciate the honest review. We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience dining with us. We will look into this to ensure that this won't happen again. Please give us another try in the future.

name: Natilie wooldridge
text:
Fried cheese cake is amazing.
11-2 menu is only M-F

resp.text: We are so glad you love our fried cheesecake, Shawn! Come see us again soon

name: Sharon Heinz (Profit Wise Accounting)
text: Great food.  Good price.  Great drink specials.   Felt rushed.  Did not have to wait on table at 6 on Friday.   Must be because they turn tables quickly!!

name: Danielle Shepherd
text: If I could give this place a zero rating I would. The place was way too small and crowded. There was food on the floor flies flying around everywhere it was just off-putting. But it was late and not many options so we tried to give the food a chance. the burger was over seasoned and greasy the bacon on it was hard as a rock the onion rings were among the worst things I've tried. Not to mention how insanely overpriced this place is. For regular fish you would expect to see here, they were priced around $22-38. For an appetizer of 8 Coconut shrimp was about $14. The mixed drink I had was very small for $8. The Malibu drink had little filaments in it of brown stuff. I had to stop drinking it. The waitress was literally all over the place. This restaurants way of dividing up tables among servers is insane. She shouldn't have had 5 tables in this little place! Never again and please don't waste your money or time here unless you're already drunk, desperate, or rich.

resp.text:
Danielle,
We are so embarrassed by this review. We are so, so sorry to hear that you had such a bad experience dining with us. We will learn from this review to ensure that none of this happens in the future.

name: Adam Haberman
text: My Family and I had an opportunity to try out this restaurant on vacation.  The food was great.  Our server, Monica, was fantastic.  She helped us have a memorable meal.  We will be definitely going back.

resp.text: We are delighted that you enjoyed both your meal and your service. Thank you for the five stars!

name: KM Weber
text: The food and service was great. Our server, Chad, was excellent. He was friendly and recommended options on the menu. The cole slaw was fantastic and I really dislike cole slaw typically. We had a toddler along which can be difficult at times, but there were many families with children and it wasn't an issue. The food came quickly. We enjoyed the Seafood Platter, Flounder Basket, and the Popcorn Shrimp basket. You've got to try the Tuna Nachos! Wow!!!

name: Tim Kerber
text: Great food. Almost too small but they kept the tables turning and everyone was able to get a seat quickly that I saw while I was there. Food was very good.

name: Matt Shivers
text: Good food. Good folks. Will definitely go back!

resp.text: We really appreciate your great review, Shivoff! We're looking forward to having you dine with us again soon!

name: Jim Preston
text: Great food good service.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Jim! We value you as a loyal customer

name: Bert Lawrenz
text: great food cozy

name: Amy Young
text: Well I went in with my mother in law to eat and what was once $40 on the menu was $80. They doubled the prices in a weeks time because it was summer. This is price gouging. I am a local and will never go back in there again. To top it off we couldn't really eat because the waitress kept coming and having a seat at our table. No I did not know her. I swear she was high on something but someone had to see she kept bothering us and never said a word to her

resp.text:
Hey Amy,
We are so sorry to hear that you had such a bad experience. We do not want to lose you as a customer so we are looking at ways to improve this situation so that way the next time you stop in, you will have a much better experience.

name: Susan Smith
text:
Took along time to be seated and order.kind of expensive.The food was hot and tasted good
If you have little ones they will be bored. Luckily our boys love Shrimp so when we got food 😋

resp.text:
Hey Susan!
We are so glad we gave you a fast experience. We hope to see y'all again soon.

name: Joshua E. Mason
text: Horrible service, the place was not clean ,and the food was overpriced and not quality. Three of our party got sick... I wish I could give 0 stars.

resp.text:
Hey Joshua,
We are horrified by this review because we keep our clean incredibly clean and maintain our highly rated health inspection and pride ourselves on our service and quality food. We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We will look into this review to ensure no one else has this experience.

name: Steph Worts
text: Awesome hole-in-the-wall, dive atmosphere. The seafood gumbo is AMAZING.

resp.text:
Hey Steph!
Thanks so much for the great review! Come see us soon for some more gumbo!

name: Heidi Englade
text: Excellent everything was great and be sure your going to sleep to full

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that, Heidi! See you in again soon

name: Leo Frazee Frazee
text: Great shrimp and fish lunch special.

name: Georgia Schulz
text: It was quick and food was delicious. I recommend getting the fried calamari, they give u a lot and it's great.

resp.text:
Hey Georgia,
Thanks for the great review! We are so glad you love our fried calamari. Hope to see you soon!

name: Ali Bacon
text: Very friendly atmosphere with great fresh dishes!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ali! Stop in and see us again soon.

name: Jessica Webster
text: The only reason I gave this place 4 stars is for the food. 2 years in a row I've come here and the service wasn't great, and the place was super crowded (which the crowding I know can't be helped). Waited forever for the food too. BUT. the baked oysters are AMAZING and whatever I've ordered has been delicious. So, come with patience, a good attitude, (and maybe some playing cards) and you'll enjoy yourself.

name: Lorna Wilch
text: We specifically ate there for the steamed Royal red shrimp, however they were disappointingly small and overcooked. Not worth what they charged for it.

resp.text:
Hey Lorna,
We appreciate your honest review. We ensure you that we will use this review to learn from it tome sure that this doesn't happen again in the future. We hope you give us another try in the future.

name: Rita D
text: We were a group of 4 adults and 6 kids. We were immediately seated and ordered but waited almost 45 minutes for our food. Other groups who came in after us were eating and done before we got our food. The food was Luke warm and under seasoned and the waitress had a negative attitude. To top it off the bathroom located outside was filthy. Overall the service and food deserved 1 star. The prices are high, and the portions are minute. $18 for Chicken Alfredo and the Alfredo is not seasoned. The kids cheeseburgers were ordered well done but we're so burnt they were inedible. The Caesar salad dressing is absolutely awful, it tastes like nothing but mayo. The sweet tea is not sweet, the blackened fish was not seasoned and the BlackBerry cobbler crust was undercooked almost to the point of being raw, and the cornbread had no seasoning. If you just want to throw money away this is the perfect place.

resp.text:
Hey Che' '
We're so sorry to hear that you had such a bad experience. We will work on all of these things in order to create a better experience for you and whoever stops in.

name: Michael Jinks
text: Friendly service, good food, established restaurant

resp.text: Thanks so much, Michael!

name: Ann Bentley
text: Delicious,  fresh great oysters on the half shell, fried shrimp, and fried catfish basket.  Quick service. Had a 10 minute wait, but was able to see 4 tables opening up, so it 2asnt long before we were seated.  Love King Neptune's!

name: Its Me
text: Not the same. Used to bring family and friends here but unfortunately today will be our last. Prices have become unreasonable in comparison to alot of local higher end restaurants. Quantity isn't quite there as well. Used to be one of my top restaurants and a go to as family tradition. In my opinion K. Neptunes has become a tourist pleaser and no longer loyal to the locals.

resp.text:
Hey J B,
We are so sad to hear that you think that. We love our locals and loyal customers and pride ourselves on fulfilling traditions, such as your own. We will learn from your review to ensure that we never lose our quality in the price of quantity.

name: Carmen “Mslovelylade” Maldonado
text: Gumbo was great!

name: Emily C
text: Prices are too high for the quality of food.

resp.text:
Hey Emily,
We are sorry that you feel that way. We will learn from this review to change things for the future.

name: Sue Mapp
text: We heard from locals that this was a very good “local” restaurant!!  We were sorely disappointed- my husband paid $27 for a combojumbo shrimp & oyster basket thinking it was something exceptional!! What he got was 6 shrimp & 3 oysters - nothing was jumbo about it!! Both were very small & the oysters were mostly breading!! We may not be locals but will certainly pass on the word to all our friends who visit Orange Beach. $59 + tip seems a little high for lunch for 2 people especially for the quality of the food. We even had frozen crinkle French fries!! You got us once but never again!!

resp.text:
Hey Sue,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We will look into everything you were unhappy with to ensure that everyone will have a much better experience overall.

name: Stephen Pridgen
text: Local gulf seafood is really good! Lunch pricing is very reasonable.

resp.text:
Hey Stephen!
Thanks for the great review. We are so happy you love our seafood and lunch pricing. Stop in and see us again soon

name: Nick Monroe
text:
This was our first stop when we got into town on Tuesday... last experience we had here wasnt bad at all. This one however was the worst in ANY restaurant I've ever dined at.

We walked right in around 6ish, were greeted soonish after. Got our drink order in (all regular drinks, no alc) took awhile but they finally came, we ordered our meals as soon as they arrived. Then, we waited for about an hour for our food, AN HOUR! The waitress walked by several times, just asking if we were ok, no explanation, no apologies, nothing. My wife almost talked me into paying for our drinks and leaving but I was HANGRY. Got our food finally with a small insincere apology, no discount offered, nothing. Only reason I gave 2 stars was bc the food was decent.

Probably wont come back next year.

resp.text:
Hey Nick,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience dining with us. Having dined with us before, we hope that you understand we had a bad day and not all days are like this. That being said, we hate that you had to wait for your food and drinks and will use this review to learn and get better on our part. We hope you give us another try in the future.

name: Teresa Elliott
text: Took a girls trip to the beach, it was packed so we ate at the bar. Chris the bar tend was AWESOME!!!! the drinks were amazing, the food was so good. We went there twice while on our vacation. Chris makes any drink taste so good.

name: Mike Center
text: A tiny gem of a place to get some great seafood! We had a party of eight and everyone enjoyed their meal. Friendly staff took care of our needs and didn't rush us - out standing service.

name: Randy Emrick
text: Pretty good food. Fun and friendly. Slow service, but I'll be back.

resp.text: Hey Randy, We are sorry to her that the service wasn't the greatest. We will take your review and learn from it to ensure that it will be much better for the next time you come back. Hope to see you soon

name: Michael Woodfin
text: Great, local owned, seafood restaurant. Fast service and delicious food, never have had a bad experience here. Owners are extremely friendly and always do their best to make sure you leave happy.

name: Sherie Ohrstrom
text: Food was excellent as always. Service not so much but this was the first time in 5 years that we experienced poor service.

resp.text:
Hey Sherie,
We appreciate your honest feedback. After coming to us for 5 years, we hope you understand we sometimes have our bad days. We hope you give us another try in the future

name: les haynes
text: Wonderful.  Service was excellent, too.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that, Les! Come see us again soon

name: CYNTHIA DILLMAN
text: Very disappointed in the food. Too salty and shrimp was very small.

name: Alison Mateja
text: Always delicious! For a great price

resp.text: We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer, Alison! Thanks for the great review.

name: Paul Emery
text: My wife and I arrived just before closing and we were welcomed in without complaint. I ordered the Caribbean platter with the mahi and wife chose the Alaskan steamed crab. Both were exceedingly delicious, served hot and cooked to order in a very timely fashion. Flavors were outstanding. The wait staff was friendly and didn't rush us even though we stayed forty five minutes after closing. Wish we had more days so we could eat here again. And again.

name: Harrison B.
text: I thought some prices were a little steep, but really it all tasted pretty good and made a good meal. The fried shrimp in particular was probably close to the best I've eaten, next to my mother's

resp.text:
Hey Harrison,
Thanks for the honest review! We are so glad to hear that our fried shrimp was close enough to your mother's cooking!
Stop in and see us again soon.

name: Christal Davis
text: Always excellent food. We eat there every year when we visit Gulf Shores

resp.text: We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer, Christal! Thanks so much for the great review

name: jack carlson
text: First off the food is ok at best considering it cost a small fortune to eat there, secondly they bring my son a glass of water that literally had trash in it. I read other reviews and it's obvious they keep saying they learn from reviews but dont. I mean frozen krinkle fries at a restaraunt that charges 90 dollars when one of the meals was a salad. Only get me once.

resp.text:
Hey Jack,
We appreciate you writing this review so that way we can learn from it. We are not sure what happened for something to be in your drink, but that is not acceptable and definitely not up to our standards. We apologize for your experience and will look into our prices.

name: tncoltsfan
text: Walked into a nearly half full restaurant and was told they were closed!!! OPEN sign in the window clearly was lit up!

name: Amanda Dixon
text: Best value on the beach we got 18 shrimp in a basket for 13 dollars butterflied and added a salad for 95 cents. The drinks are 99 cents and you can even by the dessert of the day for 99 cents. Nice to be able to eat out on vacation fill up and not drain your wallet. Amazing service and no wait.

resp.text: Thank you Amanda for your kind words and we are delighted that you enjoyed your meal with us.

name: Michele Beech
text: First time customers. It wasn't crowded since we were early enough to beat the dinner rush. I ordered the crab and shrimp quesadillas. Unfortunately there was a good amount of crab and shrimp shell in the dish. Difficult to enjoy something that you were tentative to try to chew. Hubs ordered the royal reds. Disappointed that they were cooked insufficiently so that they couldn't be peeled properly. He said they were bland as well.  On the upside,  our daughter thoroughly enjoyed her blackened mahi mahi. However, she had to ask for butter for her baked potato.  I gave her the sour cream I had for the quesadillas.  Slow service and poor food prep left our experience lacking. The 2 star rating I'm giving is simply explained by 2 of the 3 entrees being less than favorable. High prices. Food that lacked several essentials. Poor service. Not a winning combination.

resp.text:
Hey Michele,
We are so sorry that you didn't have a great experience with us. We appreciate your honest feedback and will learn from your review to ensure that the food prep and service will be improved for everyone who visits and hopefully your family in the future.

name: Shay Roberts
text: King Neptune's never disappoints.  New lunch menu weekly so you can always have something different. Free tea with meat + 4.  Employees are always pleasant.

name: Lynn Viddaurri
text: Was told to have a seat. Waited 15 min and asked for a menu thinking that would prompt someone to wait on us. I was wrong, we finally left after 20 min.

name: Steve Swanson
text: The shrimp and grits were amazing!

name: stacy burton
text: The food is excellent

name: Dee De Luna
text: Husband and I eat here EVERY Time we are in town. The best food and prices. Really homey

resp.text: Hey Dee! We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer. See you again soon!

name: Jeff
text: Very over priced for fried seafood. Food was good but not great.

resp.text:
Hey Jeff,
We are so sorry to hear that you didn't think our restaurant was exceptional. We will use your review to look into our prices. Please give us another try in the future.

name: Timothy Laflamme
text: Food is good, but somewhat overpriced for what you get.  The crab claws are delicious, crab and corn bisque is awesome... but, the stuffed blue crab could use less bread crumbs and some actual crab meat; tasted like a steamed slice of bread with some crab juice.

resp.text: Hey Timothy! Thanks for the honest review. We will learn from it to better the stuffed blue crab for the future

name: Alex Stallings
text: I've been to King Neptune's several times over the past two decades coming to the beach and was never disappointed, however this go-around was terrible. The prices were through the roof for a crab and shrimp steamer plate, which only included half of a king crab, about 6 shrimp, and 6 Royal Reds, 2 medium potatoes and a short corn of cob will run you about $48 not including drinks. Our meth head looking waitress told us it would be plenty for two people. I looked on the website at the menu and a hamburger steak runs $18 so overall I'd say the entire place is overpriced. We won't be going back. If I could give it to zero Stars I would.

name: Chris Buckley
text: Gulf Shores hole in the wall.  The place to go if you want fried seafood.  Tried the gumbo, coconut shrimp, and baked oysters (with Parmesan garlic butter).  All great.  Our service was good, but they were busy and it seemed like they weren't quite able to keep up.  Perhaps they were short that day.  We will definitely be going back though.

name: surveyorez
text: Maybe 10 tables in the whole place, with three servers, and we got the worst service I've received in a long time. Didn't refill drinks, brought wrong food, didn't know the difference between snow and king crab. Forgot kids sides. And over priced. The best thing at a seafood place is the kids chicken strips. Never recommend to anyone.......

name: les haynes
text: Wonderful.  Service was excellent, too.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that, Les! Come see us again soon

name: Adam Halter
text: Drinks were great and the food was even better! The staff was very friendly, fast, and there was no waiting for a seat during lunch. lunch

name: paul davis
text: Great variety,  friendly service,  local atmosphere.  Early dinner time is less crowded.   With the wait if you have to wait.

name: stacy burton
text: The food is excellent

name: Sherie Ohrstrom
text: Food was excellent as always. Service not so much but this was the first time in 5 years that we experienced poor service.

resp.text:
Hey Sherie,
We appreciate your honest feedback. After coming to us for 5 years, we hope you understand we sometimes have our bad days. We hope you give us another try in the future

name: Leo Frazee Frazee
text: Great shrimp and fish lunch special.

name: A
text: Good fresh food and friendly service. Food was a bit over priced for a small portion.

resp.text: We are so glad you loved your food and service, Laura. See you soon

name: John Van Abbema
text: Food was delicious. So far, they have the best raw oysters.

resp.text:
Hey John!
We are so glad you think we have the best raw oysters. All of our oysters are right from the local Bon Secour fishery!

name: Susan Smith
text:
Took along time to be seated and order.kind of expensive.The food was hot and tasted good
If you have little ones they will be bored. Luckily our boys love Shrimp so when we got food 😋

resp.text:
Hey Susan!
We are so glad we gave you a fast experience. We hope to see y'all again soon.

name: Emily C
text: Prices are too high for the quality of food.

resp.text:
Hey Emily,
We are sorry that you feel that way. We will learn from this review to change things for the future.

name: James Smith
text: A dozen fresh oysters.....mmmmmm good !!

resp.text: Yum! Thanks for stopping in, James!

name: Will Stockdale
text: Awesome

name: Zachary Crabtree
text: SLOW AND RUDE!!! When we finally got our food the order was wrong. They gave the kids fish instead of chicken. They brought a manager out, was very rude to us making it seem like it was our fault. Never apologized for getting the order wrong. Couldnt even get simple things right like giving us our silverware. Overpriced for quality of food, add in the poor service and for sure not worth it.

resp.text:
Hey Zachary,
We are so sorry to hear that you had such a bad experience. We will work on all of these things in order to create a better experience for everyone.

name: Kelly Green
text: Friendly staff. Prices are just too high. Though there are a bit better lunch specials/ prices. Thank you for giving us to go drink containers even though we left without ordering food.

resp.text: You are welcome! Next time you make a trip in, explore  the menu, we have some very yummy lower menu item prices! Also we always have some type of specials  going on!

name: Chris Kuhlman
text: The food is delicious and plentiful. Family ate here on vacation and enjoyed it very much. Lost a star for service being a little slow, but it was worth the wait.

name: Gary Pikal
text: Friendly staff.

name: Rachael Walker
text: Way over priced.  Food was not the best.  My fish had more breading than it was fish.  Would not recommend and would never come back.  Service was very slow and our server kept forgetting to bring stuff.

resp.text:
Hey Rachael,
We are so sorry to hear that you had such a bad experience. We hope to change that in the future.

name: Julia Richardson
text:
The food was not good. I ate it because I was hungry.
The waitress lied to my cousin about the price of an 8 ounce ribeye steak and fries.
The manager came over and asked were we okay. She explained the situation to the manager. She would not change the price. I wish I could rate this restaurant a zero.
We only ate here because Lambert's had a packed house and we were ready to eat!

resp.text:
Hey Julia,
We're shocked to hear that you ate all of your food and weren't pleased with your meal. Our waitresses and managers are trained to offer a different option for something you did not like. That being said, you did have a manager waiting on you so we are slightly confused how prices got miscommunicated. However, we are sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy your experience. We hope to change your opinion in the future.

name: Adam Halter
text: Drinks were great and the food was even better! The staff was very friendly, fast, and there was no waiting for a seat during lunch. lunch

name: LISA FISHER
text: Looks like a hole in the wall,  but the food and service was excellent.  Must give it a try if you love great seafood!  Would recommend to others.

name: Tony Goodwin
text: Always great never been disappointed with the food or service

resp.text:
Hey Tony!
Thanks for the great review. We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer

name: Amariah McMahon
text: I had the chicken pasta and OMG....it was amazing 👌🏼

resp.text:
Hey Amariah!
Thanks so much for the great review. We're so glad you loved your chicken pasta!

name: Bud Garner
text: Don't believe the sub 4 star review. Excellent seafood and Cajun dishes. You will not be disappointed.

resp.text:
Hey Bud,
Thank you for the honest and nice review! We really appreciate it. Hope to see you soon.

name: Glenn allgood
text: Absolutely LOVE this place! Amazing food! Will be back! Love the people small town friendly!

name: Ron Desyllas
text: Was not impressed at all. Bad service. Ordered "all you can eat shrimp". Server never asked if I wanted more.  Got about 6 French fries and 1 hush puppy.  Fries were cold. Just brought the check.  Much better places to chose from

name: shadow killer
text: The lunch special taste like garbage the food was cold when it got out and the wait was forever

resp.text:
Hey Shadow,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience dining with us. This is completely out of ordinary for us, so we will take this review to heart and learn from this review to ensure this experience won't happen again in the future

name: katie hickman
text: Excellent food!

name: Curt Brewer
text:
Pretty good food.

My girl was not so much a fan of it, mostly because of the fried food/lack of healthy options on the menu.

The all-you-can-eat basket was small but the waitress was very attentive and made sure that we were satisfied.

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking your time Curt to give us a review.  We hope to see you again!

name: Jim T
text: Down home type seafood at it's best at reasonable prices for the area .Opted to pass on Shrimp Fest to eat here and glad we did.

resp.text: Hey Jim! Thanks for the great review. We are so happy you had a great experience. Stop in and see us again soon!

name: Michael Goll
text: Horrible service and way over priced

resp.text:
Hey Michael,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience dining with us. We are known for our service and local seafood, so we are sad to hear that this experience did not meet not only your, but our standards. We will learn from your review to ensure that you will have a much better experience the next time you stop in.

name: Claudette Coleman
text: Inexpensive lunch menu, good food.

resp.text:
Hey Claudette,
Thanks so much for the great review, we really appreciate it. We are so glad to hear you love our inexpensive lunch menu. Hope to see you in again soon.

name: Jason Vice
text: Been a customer for 18 years. Always a good experience, until this year. I didn’t talk to the manager, or owner, but I will not be back. Prices were twice as high as anywhere else we have ate this year. We have been in gulf Shores for 6 days. Was saving the best for last, or so we thought. I’m not complaining, but I will not be back. Food was ok, nothing special. The amount of food we received was about half of what we got at other places. Sorry King Neptunes, just telling the truth. For the record, I have never give any restaurant a bad review, and I am nearly 50 yrs old. I’m just tired of people getting ripped off.

name: weston browder
text: Absolutely amazing as always

name: Christine Weihing
text: No better place for lunch! Food specials are awesome! Friendly staff and great service!

resp.text: Hey Christine! We are so happy to hear that you had a fabulous experience. Thanks for the great review!

name: Sarah Barnett
text: So overpriced! The portions are tiny. They didn't have what we wanted so we had to get something else. We spent $44 on a chicken basket, ( 15 french fries, coleslaw, 1 hush puppy 4 chicken nuggets basically),  my husband got the shrimp and andouille  sausage skewers and the shrimp was the size of a nickle and cooked to death. Not worth it. If you think it always has a long line and looks busy well that's because it has very few tables. I realize something there must be good but if it is just fried seafood you can get it for half the price other places.

resp.text: Hey Sarah, we're sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We will take your review and learn from it to ensure the next time you and anyone else else stop in, it is a much better experience.

name: Barbara Corona
text: Delicious  as usual  we stop at least once  or twice a year!!!!

resp.text: We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer, Barbara Come see us again soon

name: E. T. Wade
text: Awesome food. $102 for 3 dinners & drinks. Good atmosphere and service.

resp.text:
Hey E.T.,
Thanks for the sweet review! Come see us again soon!

name: Chris Noble
text: Best gumbo in town! All the Cajun and fried fare was perfect as well!

resp.text:
Hey Chris!
Thanks for the great review. We are so glad to hear. that you love our gumbo!

name: Parker Goodwin
text: Food was good.  Any fried fish will be delicious.

resp.text:
Hey Parker,
Thanks for the nice review! We're so glad you loved our fried fish. Stop in again soon.

name: Melissa Phillips
text:
Spent $30 for shrimp plate and left hungry. Service was awful. The plate literally came with 2 red boiled potatoes that were no bigger round than a quarter  and you would think for cost of meal you would get a whole piece of corn, wrong. Not only was it small, it was no larger than 1 1/2  inches long. A joke. They must divide whole corn into 4 pieces for their plates.    Don't waste your money here.
Used to eat here everytime we came down this way but no more.

name: Bob Sander
text: Great boiled seafood

name: Chris Woodham
text: The service was great and the food. But unless you have a dumptruck full of money with you, you will still be hungry when you leave. A six dollar "cup" of gumbo almost three bites.

name: Samantha Andrew
text: Best shrimp and grits I've ever had!

resp.text: Thanks so much Samantha! We are so glad you love our shrimp & grits!

name: Jodie Johnson
text: Great food! Stuffed mushrooms were the bomb!

resp.text: We are so happy you loved our new stuffed mushrooms! Hope to see you in again, Jodie

name: JERRY BRYANT
text: Great lunch with good prices for lunch.

name: Lacey Jane
text: Overpriced. Small portions. I expect seafood and specialties to be more expensive, but $15 for a burger is absurd.

resp.text: Hey Lacey, We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We pride ourselves on our fresh, local ingredients so unfortunately these ingredients cause prices to be slightly more expensive. However, we will take your review and learn from it to ensure that you have a much better experience the next time you're in.

name: paul davis
text: Great variety,  friendly service,  local atmosphere.  Early dinner time is less crowded.   With the wait if you have to wait.

name: Wendy Brown
text: The service was amazing, our waitress was patient the our two children and very prompt.  It didn't take long to get our order and the food was really good.  Sweet potatoes casserole was amazing!!!

resp.text: Wendy, thank you very much for the kind words and 5 star rating! We are absolutely delighted to hear that you enjoyed your visit and your meal. We hope to welcome you back soon!

name: dean brossy
text:
Had so called sea food gumbo only meat in it  was sausage.  Very over priced.
Would not recommend.

resp.text:
Hey Dean,
We are so sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your seafood gumbo. In our seafood gumbo we have shrimp, crawfish, sausage and variety of vegetables. We will learn from this review and look into our prices, but please give us another chance in the future.

name: R N
text: I will never eat here again! EXTREMELY overpriced for what you get. Too many other good choices, with far better prices around, diner be aware.

resp.text:
Hey R N,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We pride ourselves on our fresh and local ingredients so unfortunately those ingredients cause prices to be slightly more expensive. However, we are taking your review and learning from it to ensure that you have a much better experience the next time you stop in.

name: Dixieland Dirtbikes
text: Absolutely delicious, great food and service. I recommend the fried flounder. 2 large pieces for $20. Hushpuppies are delicious. Give it a try

resp.text: Thanks for the great review and the five stars. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: amanda Gregory
text: It had great service but was way over priced for the amount of food recieved. The advertise their high quality as reason for the price. I found that wasn't the case. Three adults just meals and water and our bill was over $100. The seating area was so packed that we had to ask a family to stand so we could get out the door upon leaving. If you are traveling on a budget skip this place. Food was okay but not worth the fourth dollars a meal. Next evening found a much better place Desoto's and paid half and the quality was better.

resp.text: Hey Amanda! We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We are taking your review and learning from it to ensure that the next time you stop in, you have a much better experience overall.

name: Libby Redden
text: Great food but the staff was not the friendliest. The only place down here that I have encountered a grouchy local.

resp.text: Thank you for the great  review and we are sorry about the service. Its must have been and off day for whomever it was.  We pride ourselves in friendly service. We even won the award for friendliest staff in Baldwin county!  When you come back to see us it will show!

name: davie thomas
text: Great Food Always

name: Chris McCrillis
text:
Perhaps a bad night, but my blackened shrimp was extra blackened (burnt) and easily the worst shrimp I have ever eaten.  How do you screw up shrimp when you are located a couple miles from the beach?
If the all things fried platter is your thing or you feel like spiking your cholesterol, perhaps this is your place.  It seemed popular just plan to exercise the next morning or risk a coronary on your vacation to the Gulf Coast.

resp.text:
Hey Chris,
We are so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience dining with us. We get our shrimp from Bon Secour, the local fishery in Fort Morgan, so we are very surprised to hear that you were displeased with it. However, as for how the shrimp is cooked, we will take your review and learn from it.

name: Kimberly Fregia
text:
Personally didn't care for the food.
The tables are uneven.
Chairs were uncomfortable.
Ranks with school cafeteria food ( a little more seasoned than hospital food).

name: Joseph Tyree
text: Food was extremely overpriced! We also saw a cockroach run across the floor while waiting for our food. Was extremely disappointed in this place. Will never go here again.

resp.text:
Hey Joseph,
We are horrified by this review. We keep an extremely clean restaurant so we assure you that the "cockroach" you saw was a Palmetto bug, which live in the palm trees down here. Besides the point, we are so sorry to hear that you thought our food was over priced. We hope to change your mind in the future.

name: Teresa Redding Keene
text: Very good food, small place must look to find it.

resp.text:
Hey Teresa!
Thanks for the great review. Come see us again soon

name: gary spencer
text: Consently good food and great service!

resp.text:
Hey Gary!
Thanks for the great review. We are so lucky to call you a loyal customer. Hope to see you soon!

name: Clint Loufl (Sintar)
text: Good food but prices were a bit high for a small plates.

resp.text:
Hey Clint!
Thanks for the review. We will forward this review to the correct management in hope to learn from this review. We hope that the next time you stop in, you have a much better experience.

name: Jimmy Smith
text: Pretty good food at a decent price

name: Gabrielle Mitchell
text: I absolutely love King Neptune's.  Great food, small diner atmosphere and reasonable prices.  ❤️

name: Trent Eubanks
text: Superb fresh local Gulf seafood. Always a good meal but the prices are high when compared to similar offerings in other nearby restaurants. most everything is fries but the breadings are light and rarely overly greasy. Sevings are ample and even generous in most plates. Highly recommended spot for a casual, delicious seafood lunch and dinner.

name: Ebony Hall
text: The hospitality was great here! We ordered the royal red shrimp and the gumbo.  This is a must go every time that I come to gulf shores

resp.text:
Hey Ebony!
Thanks for the awesome review! We are so happy to hear you loved your royal reds and gumbo! Come see us again soon

name: Brenda Nolan
text: Great place to eat ...great people

resp.text: Thank you so much for the nice review, Brenda! We really appreciate you and your service.

name: BL Chambliss, CSCP
text: Very good. Don't be fooled by the modest appearance. This place can really cook!

resp.text:
Hey BL!
Thanks for the great review. See ya soon!

name: Matt
text: Good food, a little pricy but to be expected where you are
